Ka whakahaeretia ā-waeahia ngā whakaritenga i raro i ngā Pae Mataara 3 me te 4, i ngā wā e rite ana. Ka rite tonu ngā whakaritenga mō ngā Pae Mataara 1 me te 2. Ka utua tonutia ngā utu e rite ana e Te Hiranga Tangata. Ka whakamāramatia ngā utu e wātea ana i te pae tukutuku o Te Hiranga Tangata (external link) . Kei te wātea hoki ēnei utu mō te hunga whakawhiwhi mahi mō rātou anō. --- Section Separator --- Information for Māori Support and information for Pacific Peoples Support and information for disabled people Support your community Alternate formats Translations አማርኛ | Amharic عربي | Arabic Bislama 简体中文 | Chinese (Simplified) 繁體中文 | Chinese (Traditional) Te Reo Māori Kuki ‘Āirani | Cook Islands Māori Español | Spanish دری | Dari فارسی | Farsi Vosa Vakaviti | Fijian ગુજરાતી | Gujarati हिन्दी / Hindi 日本語 | Japanese ကညီ | Karen Te taetae ni Kiribati | Kiribati 한국어 | Korean Bahasa Malaysia | Malay Vagahau Niue | Niuean پښتو | Pashto ਪੰਜਾਬੀ / Punjabi Rohingya Fäeag Rotuḁm | Rotuman Gagana Samoa | Samoan Solomon Aelan Pijin | Solomon Islands Pijin Af-Soomaali | Somali Kiswahili | Swahili Tagalog தமிழ் | Tamil Te reo Māori ภาษาไทย | Thai ትግርኛ | Tigrinya Tok Pisin Te Gagana Tokelau | Tokelauan Lea Faka Tonga | Tongan Te Gana Tuvalu | Tuvaluan اُردُو | Urdu Tiếng Việt | Vietnamese አማርኛ | Amharic عربي | Arabic Bislama 简体中文 | Chinese (Simplified) 繁體中文 | Chinese (Traditional) Te Reo Māori Kuki ‘Āirani | Cook Islands Māori Español | Spanish دری | Dari فارسی | Farsi Vosa Vakaviti | Fijian ગુજરાતી | Gujarati हिन्दी / Hindi 日本語 | Japanese ကညီ | Karen Te taetae ni Kiribati | Kiribati 한국어 | Korean Bahasa Malaysia | Malay Vagahau Niue | Niuean پښتو | Pashto ਪੰਜਾਬੀ / Punjabi Rohingya Fäeag Rotuḁm | Rotuman Gagana Samoa | Samoan Solomon Aelan Pijin | Solomon Islands Pijin Af-Soomaali | Somali Kiswahili | Swahili Tagalog தமிழ் | Tamil Te reo Māori ภาษาไทย | Thai ትግርኛ | Tigrinya Tok Pisin Te Gagana Tokelau | Tokelauan Lea Faka Tonga | Tongan Te Gana Tuvalu | Tuvaluan اُردُو | Urdu Tiếng Việt | Vietnamese
Home Iwi and communities Translations Te reo Māori Ngā āwhinatanga | Available support Tautoko mā te takitahi me ngā whānau | Support for individuals and families --- Section Separator --- Ina whakaaro koe he taumaha rawa, he whaitake tonu te kōrero ki tētahi mātanga hauora. He nui nga āhuatanga e taea e tātou katoa te hiki i tō tātou oranga hinengaro me ērā o ō tātou e arohaina ana: Me noho tūhono tonu ki ngā hoa me te whānau - he mea nui tēnei mō tō tātou oranga, ā, he āwhina kia noho haumaru ake, kia iti iho te pōkaikaha, me te iti iho te anipā. Me whāki i ō kare ā-roto - he rongo māori noa te rongo i te wairua haukerekere, pōkaikaha, anipā, māharahara, mataku rānei. Whakawāteatia he wā e aro ai koe, e whakaputa ai koe i ō kare ā-roto. Me whai tonu i ngā hātepe mēnā ka taea - me ngana ki te hanga i ngā whakaritenga auau i tō tauoranga, ā, kaua e whakapiki i ngā ritenga hauora-kore pēnei i te kai hāneanea, te inu, te kai paipa me te rehutupeka. Tirohia ētahi atu tāngata e hiahia āwhina ana pea - mā te toro atu o te ringa ki te hunga e pōkaikahatia ana pea, e māharahara ana rānei ka āwhina pea i a kōrua tahi. Whakawhāitihia tō wā tuihono - kiakotahi, kia rua rānei ō tirohanga ki ngā arapāho me ngā pae pāpori i te rā. E wātea ana ētahi waea āwhina e tuku tautoko, mōhiohio, āwhinatanga ana hoki mā te katoa e taumahatia ana e te oranga hinengaro. E wātea ana ngā ratonga katoa 24 hāora i te rā, 7 rā i te wiki. Rapua he waea āwhina oranga hinengaro He pai noa iho te tono āwhina. I a tātau ka anga whakamua ana, he tāngata, he rōpū anō kei reira hei tautoko i a koe. Anei ngā tūmomo tohutohu, āwhina, tautoko hoki mēnā e hiahiatia ana e koe. Mēnā kāore koe i te mātau ki te reo Ingarihi, ka āhei koe ki te tono mō tētahi kaiwhakamāori ina waea atu ki te nuinga o ngā tari kāwanatanga. --- Section Separator --- Ina whakaaro koe he taumaha rawa, he whaitake tonu te kōrero ki tētahi mātanga hauora. Home Iwi and communities Translations Te reo Māori Whakatewhatewha Pānga | Contact tracing Ngā tāngata i pātata | Casual contacts --- Section Separator --- Mēnā ka pā mai ngā tohumate ki a koe me waea atu ki Healthline, me haere kia aromatawaihia koe ka noho ki te kāinga tae noa: Ki te wā ka whiwhi otinga e kī ana kāore ia i te mate, ā Mō te 24 haora i muri i te mutunga o ōna tohumate. Kāo, engari anō mēnā ka pā mai ngā tohumate. Ko ētahi o ngā tohumate KOWHEORI-19 pea ko tētahi maremare hou, kino kē atu rānei, te kirikā, hēmanawa, mamae korokoro, heke te hūpē, kua kore rānei e rongo ā-ihu/ā-tāwara mō tētahi wā. Ka pā mai anō pea ki ētahi tāngata te mate tikotiko, ānini māhunga, mamae uaua, whakapairuaki, pōkaikaha, te kārangi rānei. Mēnā kei te uaua te hēhē, waea atu mō te waka tūroro: Waea ki 111 . Mēnā ka pā mai ngā tohumate ki a koe. Mēnā ka pā mai he tohumate ki a koe, me waea atu ki Healthline, me aromatawaihia ka noho ki te kāinga. Kia whakaatu rā anō tō aromatawai kāore koe i te mate Mō te 24 haora i muri i te mutunga o ō tohumate Me noho wehe i ētahi atu i tō kāinga mēnā ka taea. Mō ngā mōhiohio Pokapū Aromatawai me waea atu ki Healthline i 0800 358 5453 , haere rānei ki healthpoint.co.nz/covid-19 (external link) Kāore he utu mō ngā aromatawai. Ko te tukanga noa mēnā ka kitea i te aromatawai kei te mate koe ka waea mai te Hauora Tūmatanui. Ka whakamōhiotia atu koe e rātau me aha koe ā muri ake. Ko te tikanga mēnā ka kitea e te aromatawai kāore koe i te mate ka whakamōhiotia atu koe mā te patowaea. Ehara i te mea me aromatawai ētahi atu tāngata o tō whare, me noho ki te kāinga rānei, engari ia mēnā ka pā mai ngā tohumate ki a rātau. Me waea atu te hunga ka pāngia e ngā tohumate ki Healthline i 0800 358 5453 . --- Section Separator --- Mēnā ka pā mai ngā tohumate ki a koe me waea atu ki Healthline, me haere kia aromatawaihia koe ka noho ki te kāinga tae noa: Ki te wā ka whiwhi otinga e kī ana kāore ia i te mate, ā Mō te 24 haora i muri i te mutunga o ōna tohumate. --- Section Separator --- Kāo, engari anō mēnā ka pā mai ngā tohumate. Home Iwi and communities Translations Te reo Māori Whakatewhatewha Pānga | Contact tracing Ngā tāngata noa i pātata | Casual plus contacts --- Section Separator --- Mēnā ka pā mai ngā tohumate ki te tangata me waea atu ki Healthline, me haere kia aromatawaihia koe ka noho ki te kāinga tae noa: Ki te wā ka whiwhi otinga e kī ana kāore ia i te mate, ā Mō te 24 haora i muri i te mutunga o ōna tohumate. Mēnā i te wāhi pūtake koe i te wā i whakahuatia, me mātua noho koe ki te kāinga. Ka taea anake e koe te wehe i te kāinga mēnā kei te haere koe kia aromatawaitia mō te KOWHEORI-19, mēnā rānei ka pā mai he ohotata, ā, kei te noho mōrearea koe. Me haere koe kia aromatawaitia: I muri tonu mai i tō mōhio he tangata koe i tātata I te rā 5 i muri mai o te rā i tae atu koe ki te wāhi pūtake (kia wawe tonu rānei, mēnā kua hipa kē te rima rā). I te wā kei te kāinga koe me noho wehe mai i ētahi atu tāngata i tō whare mēnā ka taea. Ka taea e koe te korikori tinana i waho, engari i tōu whare mēnā ka taea haumarutia wehe mai i ētahi atu. Arā, ko ngā mahi pea pērā i te hikihiki maitai i tō iari, te whakamahi taura pekepeke i tō ara kuhunga rānei. Kāore e uru mai ki tēnei ko ngā mahi i waho atu o tō kāinga, iari rānei pērā i te heri i te kurī ki te hīkoi i te takiwā noho. Mēnā he kaimahi waiwai koe, tē taea e koe te wehe i tō whare ki te haere ki te mahi. Mēnā i te wāhi pūtake koe, me noho taratahi koe i te kāinga mō te 5 rā i te iti rawa mai i tō pānga whakamutunga tae noa ki te whakaatu a tō aromatawai rā 5 kāore koe i te mate. Me tirotiro e koe ngā tohumate mō te 14 rā. Me waea atu te hunga ka pāngia e ngā tohumate ki Healthline i 0800 358 5453 . Mō ngā mōhiohio Pokapū Aromatawai me waea atu ki Healthline i 0800 358 5453 , haere rānei ki healthpoint.co.nz/covid-19 (external link) Mēnā kāore koe i te āhei atu ki tētahi waka tūmataiti mā te whānau, ngā tautoko hapori rānei, me whakapā atu ki tō tari hauora tūmatanui. Kāore he utu mō ngā aromatawai. Ko te tukanga noa mēnā ka kitea i te aromatawai kei te mate koe ka waea mai te Hauora Tūmatanui. Ka whakamōhiotia atu koe e rātau me aha koe ā muri ake. Ko te tikanga mēnā ka kitea e te aromatawai kāore koe i te mate ka whakamōhiotia atu koe mā te patowaea. Me noho wehe koe mai i ētahi atu o te whare ina taea. Kaua rawa e tuari rīhi, kapu, taputapu kai, pera, taora rānei me ētahi atu i tō whare. Me horoi i ō mea ki rō wai hopihopi wera. Ka āhei ngā tāngata katoa o tō whare (hāunga te tangata i tae atu ki te wāhi pūtake) ki te puta atu ki waho engari kaua mēnā ka pā mai ngā tohumate ki a rātau. Ki te pā mai he tohumate KOWHEORI-19 ki tētahi atu, me noho ki te kāinga ka waea atu ki Healthline kia aromatawaitia. Me noho ki te kāinga tae noa: Ki te wā ka whiwhi otinga e kī ana kāore ia i te mate, ā Mō te 24 haora i muri i te mutunga o ōna tohumate. Ehara i te mea me aromatawai ētahi atu tāngata o te whare, engari ia mēnā ka pā mai ngā tohumate ki a rātau. Me waea atu te hunga ka pāngia e ngā tohumate ki Healthline i 0800 358 5453 . Mō ngā mōhiohio Pokapū Aromatawai me waea atu ki Healthline i 0800 358 5453 , haere rānei ki healthpoint.co.nz/covid-19 (external link) Kāore he utu mō ngā aromatawai. Ko te tukanga noa mēnā ka kitea i te aromatawai kei te mate koe ka waea mai te Hauora Tūmatanui. Ka whakamōhiotia atu koe e rātau me aha koe ā muri ake. Ko te tikanga mēnā ka kitea e te aromatawai kāore koe i te mate ka whakamōhiotia atu koe mā te patowaea. Ko ētahi o ngā tohumate KOWHEORI-19 pea ko tētahi maremare hou, kino kē atu rānei, te kirikā, hēmanawa, mamae korokoro, heke te hūpē, kua kore rānei e rongo ā-ihu/ā-tāwara mō tētahi wā. Ka pā mai anō pea ki ētahi tāngata te mate tikotiko, ānini māhunga, mamae uaua, whakapairuaki, pōkaikaha, te kārangi rānei. Ki te pā mai ngā tohumate ki te tangata — ahakoa kua kitea e te aromatawai kāore koe i te mate — me wawe te haere kia aromatawaitia, me noho ki te kāinga, ā, me noho wehe i ētahi atu i tō kāinga mēnā ka taea. Me pēnei haere tonu tae noa ki te 24 haora i muri mai i te mutunga o ō tohumate, ā, kia whakaatu rā anō tō aromatawai kāore koe i te mate. Mēnā kei te uaua te hēhē, waea atu mō te waka tūroro: Waea ki 111 . Me mātua noho te tangata i tae atu ki te wāhi pūtake ki te kāinga. Engari anō ki te pā mai he tohumate, ka āhei ētahi atu i tō whare ki te haere ki te hoko kai. Mēnā ka mate koe ki te haere, ka taea anō e koe te tono tētahi hoa, he kiritata, he whanaunga rānei kia heria mai ō kai me ō rongoā ki tō kūaha. Engari, kāore koe e āhei ki te kōrero ki a ia, tētahi atu tangata i pā rānei ki a ia i a ia i reira. Ka taea e koe te tono tuihono ngā kai mā ngā toa hokomaha paetata me tā rātau Ratonga Āwhina Whakaarotau. Ka taea te whakarato ngā tōtō kai ki tō kēti, tō kūaha rānei – haere ki familyservices.govt.nz (external link) ki te kimi i tētahi pātaka kai, waea atu rānei ki 0800 890 110 ki te ota i tētahi Kete Tautoko a Whānau Ora. He mea nui tonu mō te hunga he tohumate ō rātau, i tae atu ki tētahi wāhi pūtake, he tangata i tātata, i aromatawaitia rānei mō te KOWHEORI-19 kia kaua rawa e haere ki tētahi kano ārai mate. Waea atu ki 0800 28 29 26 , haere rānei ki bookmyvaccine.nz (external link) ki te whakarite anō i tō wāhui. Rongoā: Mēnā he ohotata, waea atu ki 111 . Mēnā ehara i te ohotata, me waea atu ki tō rata, ki Healthline rānei i 0800 358 5453 . Ngā tautoko hauora hinengaro me te oranga: He uaua pea te noho taratahi. E wātea ana he āwhina. Mēnā kei te hiahia tautoko koe, ka taea e koe te kōrero ki tētahi tumu kōrero – me waea atu, me patowaea rānei ki 1737 hei whakamahi i te ratonga ‘Need to Talk?’. He koreutu, ā, e wātea ana i te 24 haora i te rā, 7 rā i te wiki. Me kī he tino tuku tautoko i roto i te reo Ingarihi engari tērā ētahi wā ka taea te tūhono i a koe ki tētahi kaikōrero i tua atu i te reo Ingarihi. Taha pūtea: E wātea ana he tautoko pūtea mā te hunga me noho ki te kāinga nā te KOWHEORI-19 i Te Manatū Whakahiato Ora i te 7 rā i te wiki, 8am ki te 5pm i 0800 559 009 me Whānau Ora i 0800 875 663 . Mēnā kei a koe tonu tō tamaiti, kua uru tonu ia ki roto i te noho rāhui a tō whare, ā, me mātua whai i aua ture anō o tō whare. Mēnā kāore tō tamaiti i tō taha, ā, ko tō rāhui he hono atu ki tētahi atu, he whānui ake rānei, ka āhei ia ki te noho ki tō taha engari me whai ngā tāngata katoa o tō rāhui i ngā ture o tō whare. Ka āhei tonu koe ki tētahi kaitiaki kia haere ake ki tō kāinga mēnā ko koe anake te tangata e tiakina ana, ā, me mau PPE ia. Kāore ia i te āhei ki te tiaki i ētahi atu tāngata nō whare kē. --- Section Separator --- Mēnā ka pā mai ngā tohumate ki te tangata me waea atu ki Healthline, me haere kia aromatawaihia koe ka noho ki te kāinga tae noa: Ki te wā ka whiwhi otinga e kī ana kāore ia i te mate, ā Mō te 24 haora i muri i te mutunga o ōna tohumate. --- Section Separator --- Mēnā i te wāhi pūtake koe i te wā i whakahuatia, me mātua noho koe ki te kāinga. Ka taea anake e koe te wehe i te kāinga mēnā kei te haere koe kia aromatawaitia mō te KOWHEORI-19, mēnā rānei ka pā mai he ohotata, ā, kei te noho mōrearea koe. Me haere koe kia aromatawaitia: I muri tonu mai i tō mōhio he tangata koe i tātata I te rā 5 i muri mai o te rā i tae atu koe ki te wāhi pūtake (kia wawe tonu rānei, mēnā kua hipa kē te rima rā). I te wā kei te kāinga koe me noho wehe mai i ētahi atu tāngata i tō whare mēnā ka taea. Ka taea e koe te korikori tinana i waho, engari i tōu whare mēnā ka taea haumarutia wehe mai i ētahi atu. Arā, ko ngā mahi pea pērā i te hikihiki maitai i tō iari, te whakamahi taura pekepeke i tō ara kuhunga rānei. Kāore e uru mai ki tēnei ko ngā mahi i waho atu o tō kāinga, iari rānei pērā i te heri i te kurī ki te hīkoi i te takiwā noho. Mēnā he kaimahi waiwai koe, tē taea e koe te wehe i tō whare ki te haere ki te mahi. Mēnā i te wāhi pūtake koe, me noho taratahi koe i te kāinga mō te 5 rā i te iti rawa mai i tō pānga whakamutunga tae noa ki te whakaatu a tō aromatawai rā 5 kāore koe i te mate. Me tirotiro e koe ngā tohumate mō te 14 rā. Me waea atu te hunga ka pāngia e ngā tohumate ki Healthline i 0800 358 5453 . Mō ngā mōhiohio Pokapū Aromatawai me waea atu ki Healthline i 0800 358 5453 , haere rānei ki healthpoint.co.nz/covid-19 (external link) Mēnā kāore koe i te āhei atu ki tētahi waka tūmataiti mā te whānau, ngā tautoko hapori rānei, me whakapā atu ki tō tari hauora tūmatanui. Kāore he utu mō ngā aromatawai. Ko te tukanga noa mēnā ka kitea i te aromatawai kei te mate koe ka waea mai te Hauora Tūmatanui. Ka whakamōhiotia atu koe e rātau me aha koe ā muri ake. Ko te tikanga mēnā ka kitea e te aromatawai kāore koe i te mate ka whakamōhiotia atu koe mā te patowaea. Me noho wehe koe mai i ētahi atu o te whare ina taea. Kaua rawa e tuari rīhi, kapu, taputapu kai, pera, taora rānei me ētahi atu i tō whare. Me horoi i ō mea ki rō wai hopihopi wera. Ka āhei ngā tāngata katoa o tō whare (hāunga te tangata i tae atu ki te wāhi pūtake) ki te puta atu ki waho engari kaua mēnā ka pā mai ngā tohumate ki a rātau. Ki te pā mai he tohumate KOWHEORI-19 ki tētahi atu, me noho ki te kāinga ka waea atu ki Healthline kia aromatawaitia. Me noho ki te kāinga tae noa: Ki te wā ka whiwhi otinga e kī ana kāore ia i te mate, ā Mō te 24 haora i muri i te mutunga o ōna tohumate. Ehara i te mea me aromatawai ētahi atu tāngata o te whare, engari ia mēnā ka pā mai ngā tohumate ki a rātau. Me waea atu te hunga ka pāngia e ngā tohumate ki Healthline i 0800 358 5453 . Mō ngā mōhiohio Pokapū Aromatawai me waea atu ki Healthline i 0800 358 5453 , haere rānei ki healthpoint.co.nz/covid-19 (external link) Kāore he utu mō ngā aromatawai. Ko te tukanga noa mēnā ka kitea i te aromatawai kei te mate koe ka waea mai te Hauora Tūmatanui. Ka whakamōhiotia atu koe e rātau me aha koe ā muri ake. Ko te tikanga mēnā ka kitea e te aromatawai kāore koe i te mate ka whakamōhiotia atu koe mā te patowaea. Ko ētahi o ngā tohumate KOWHEORI-19 pea ko tētahi maremare hou, kino kē atu rānei, te kirikā, hēmanawa, mamae korokoro, heke te hūpē, kua kore rānei e rongo ā-ihu/ā-tāwara mō tētahi wā. Ka pā mai anō pea ki ētahi tāngata te mate tikotiko, ānini māhunga, mamae uaua, whakapairuaki, pōkaikaha, te kārangi rānei. Ki te pā mai ngā tohumate ki te tangata — ahakoa kua kitea e te aromatawai kāore koe i te mate — me wawe te haere kia aromatawaitia, me noho ki te kāinga, ā, me noho wehe i ētahi atu i tō kāinga mēnā ka taea. Me pēnei haere tonu tae noa ki te 24 haora i muri mai i te mutunga o ō tohumate, ā, kia whakaatu rā anō tō aromatawai kāore koe i te mate. Mēnā kei te uaua te hēhē, waea atu mō te waka tūroro: Waea ki 111 . Me mātua noho te tangata i tae atu ki te wāhi pūtake ki te kāinga. Engari anō ki te pā mai he tohumate, ka āhei ētahi atu i tō whare ki te haere ki te hoko kai. Mēnā ka mate koe ki te haere, ka taea anō e koe te tono tētahi hoa, he kiritata, he whanaunga rānei kia heria mai ō kai me ō rongoā ki tō kūaha. Engari, kāore koe e āhei ki te kōrero ki a ia, tētahi atu tangata i pā rānei ki a ia i a ia i reira. Ka taea e koe te tono tuihono ngā kai mā ngā toa hokomaha paetata me tā rātau Ratonga Āwhina Whakaarotau. Ka taea te whakarato ngā tōtō kai ki tō kēti, tō kūaha rānei – haere ki familyservices.govt.nz (external link) ki te kimi i tētahi pātaka kai, waea atu rānei ki 0800 890 110 ki te ota i tētahi Kete Tautoko a Whānau Ora. He mea nui tonu mō te hunga he tohumate ō rātau, i tae atu ki tētahi wāhi pūtake, he tangata i tātata, i aromatawaitia rānei mō te KOWHEORI-19 kia kaua rawa e haere ki tētahi kano ārai mate. Mēnā i tae koe te wāhi pūtake i te wā kua whakatauhia, me mātua noho koe ki te kāinga. Ka taea anake e koe te wehe i te kāinga mēnā kei te haere koe kia aromatawaitia mō te KOWHEORI-19, mēnā rānei ka pā mai he ohotata, kei te noho mōrearea hoki koe. Me haere koe kia aromatawaitia: I muri tonu mai i tō mōhio he tangata koe i tātata I te 5 rā i muri mai i tō haerenga ki te wāhi pūtake Ā, me whiwhi aromatawai atu anō 12 rā i muri mai i tō haerenga ki te wāhi pūtake. I te wā kei te kāinga me noho wehe mai i ētahi atu tāngata i tō whare mēnā ka taea. Ka taea e koe te korikori tinana i waho, engari i tōu whare mēnā ka taea haumarutia wehe mai i ētahi atu. Tērā pea ko ngā mahi pērā i te hikihiki maitai i tō iari, te whakamahi taura pekepeke i tō ara kuhunga rānei. Kāore e uru mai ki tēnei ko ngā mahi i waho atu o tō kāinga, iari rānei pērā i te heri i te kurī ki te hīkoi i te takiwā noho. Mēnā he kaimahi waiwai koe, tē taea e koe te wehe i tō whare ki te haere ki te mahi. Mēnā i te wāhi pūtake koe, me noho taratahi koe i te kāinga mō te 14 rā i te iti rawa mai i tō pānga whakamutunga, ahakoa ka kitea e te aromatawai kāore koe i te mate. Me noho taratahi koe tae noa ki te waeatanga a Healthline ki a koe ki te whakaū i tō tukutanga mai i te noho taratahi i te rā 14. Mō ngā mōhiohio Pokapū Aromatawai me waea atu ki Healthline i 0800 358 5453 , haere rānei ki healthpoint.co.nz/covid-19 (external link) Mēnā kāore ō waka me waea atu ki tō rata, ā, tērā pea ka mahi tahi tō rata me ngā ratonga hapori ki te whakarite i tētahi aromatawai, ngā whakahaere aromatawai nekeneke rānei i ngā wāhi he nui te hiahia. Kāore he utu mō ngā aromatawai. Ko te tukanga noa mō ngā aromatawai e whakaatu ana kei te mate ka waea mai te Hauora Tūmatanui. Ka whakamōhiotia atu koe e rātau me aha koe ā muri ake. Ko te tikanga mēnā ka kitea e te aromatawai kāore koe i te mate ka whakamōhiotia atu koe mā te patowaea. Me noho ngā tāngata katoa o te whare ki te kāinga kia tohu rā anō te aromatawai rā 5 o te tangata i haere ki te wāhi pūtake kāore ia i te mate. Nō reira kāore koe i te āhei ki te puta ki te: hoko kai, te tiki kai rānei tiki rongoā, mō te whiwhi kano ārai mate rānei, ētahi atu pūtake rānei, (hāunga ngā whakamaimoa hauora whāwhai). Engari ka āhei koe ki te haere ki waho ki te: korikori tinana engari me haumaru te mahi, mā te noho tawhiti mai i ētahi atu. Tē taea e koe te wehe i tō whare ki te haere ki te mahi engari ia mēnā he kaimahi waiwai koe, ā, kei te ū koe ki ētahi āhuatanga ake. Me noho ngā tāngata katoa o te whare ki te kāinga mō te 5 rā i te iti rawa – kia whakaatu rā anō te aromatawai rā 5 o te tangata i haere ki te wāhi pūtake kāore ia i te mate. Mēnā ka pā mai ngā tohumate KOWHEORI-19 ki ētahi atu me waea atu ki Healthline i 0800 358 5453 , ka roa ake pea tō wā noho taratahi. Ehara i te mea me aromatawai ētahi atu tāngata o te whare, engari ia mēnā ka pā mai ngā tohumate ki a rātau, ka tonoa rānei rātau e ngā āpiha hauora. Mō ngā mōhiohio Pokapū Aromatawai me waea atu ki Healthline i 0800 358 5453 , haere rānei ki healthpoint.co.nz/covid-19 (external link) Mēnā kāore ō waka me waea atu ki tō rata, ā, tērā pea ka mahi tahi tō rata me ngā ratonga hapori ki te whakarite i tētahi aromatawai, ngā whakahaere aromatawai nekeneke rānei i ngā wāhi he nui te hiahia. Kāore he utu mō ngā aromatawai. Ko te tukanga noa mō ngā aromatawai e whakaatu ana kei te mate ka waea mai te Hauora Tūmatanui. Ka whakamōhiotia atu koe e rātau me aha koe ā muri ake. Ko te tikanga mēnā ka kitea e te aromatawai kāore koe i te mate ka whakamōhiotia atu koe mā te patowaea. Ko ētahi o ngā tohumate KOWHEORI-19 pea ko tētahi maremare hou, kino kē atu rānei, te kirikā, hēmanawa, mamae korokoro, heke te hūpē, kua kore rānei e rongo ā-ihu/ā-tāwara mō tētahi wā. Ka pā mai anō pea ki ētahi tāngata te mate tikotiko, ānini māhunga, mamae uaua, whakapairuaki, pōkaikaha, te kārangi rānei. Ki te pā mai ngā tohumate ki te tangata — ahakoa kua kitea e te aromatawai kāore koe i te mate — me wawe te waea atu ki Healthline kia aromatawaitia, me noho ki te kāinga, ā, me noho wehe i ētahi atu i tō kāinga mēnā ka taea. Me pēnei haere tonu tae noa ki te 24 haora i muri mai i te mutunga o ō tohumate, ā, kia whakaatu rā anō tō aromatawai kāore koe i te mate. Mēnā kei te uaua te hēhē, waea atu mō te waka tūroro: Waea ki 111 . Kia whakaatu rā anō te aromatawai rā 5 kāore te tangata i tae ki te wāhi pūtake i te mate, kaua rawa he tangata e wehe i tō whare ki te tiki kai, ētahi atu ō rānei. Ka taea e koe te tono tētahi hoa, he kiritata, he whanaunga rānei kia heria mai ō kai me ō rongoā ki tō kūaha. Engari, kāore koe e āhei ki te kōrero ki a ia, tētahi atu pānga rānei ki a ia i a ia i reira. Mēnā kāore he tohumate o ētahi atu i tō whare, ka āhei rātau ki te haere ki te hoko kai i muri i te whakaatu a te aromatawai rā 5 o te tangata i haere ki te wāhi pūtake kāore ia i te mate. Mēnā ko koe te tangata i haere ki tētahi wāhi pūtake, me mātua noho koe ki te kāinga kia whakaaetia rā anō koe e te Hauora Tūmatanui kei te āhei koe ki te wehe. Ka taea e koe te tono tuihono ngā kai mā ngā toa hokomaha paetata me tā rātau Ratonga Āwhina Whakaarotau. Ka taea te whakarato ngā tōtō kai ki tō kēti, tō kūaha rānei – haere ki familyservices.govt.nz (external link) ki te kimi i tētahi pātaka kai, waea atu rānei ki 0800 890 110 ki te ota i tētahi Kete Tautoko a Whānau Ora. Me noho wehe koe mai i ētahi atu o te whare ina taea. Kaua rawa e tuari rīhi, kapu, taputapu kai, pera, taora rānei me ētahi atu i tō whare. Me horoi i ō mea ki rō wai hopihopi wera. He mea nui tonu mō te hunga he tohumate ō rātau, i tae atu ki tētahi wāhi pūtake, he tangata i tātata, i aromatawaitia rānei mō te KOWHEORI-19 kia kaua rawa e haere ki tētahi pokapū kano ārai mate, kei roto i tēnei ko ngā tāngata o tō whare kei te noho i tō kāinga. Waea atu ki 0800 28 29 26 , haere rānei ki bookmyvaccine.nz ki te whakarite anō i tō wāhui. Mēnā he kaimahi hauora waiwai koe, he kaimahi paewhenua rānei, ā, e ū ana koe ki ētahi āhuatanga ake, ka āhei pea koe ki te mahi haere tonu. Torotoro ki a Healthline ki te tirotiro. Rongoā: Mēnā he ohotata, waea atu ki 111 . Mēnā ehara i te ohotata, me waea atu ki tō rata, ki Healthline rānei i 0800 358 5453 . Ngā tautoko hauora hinengaro me te oranga: He uaua pea te noho taratahi. E wātea ana he āwhina. Mēnā kei te hiahia tautoko koe, ka taea e koe te kōrero ki tētahi tumu kōrero – me waea atu, me patowaea rānei ki 1737 hei whakamahi i te ratonga ‘Need to Talk?’. He koreutu, ā, e wātea ana i te 24 haora i te rā, 7 rā i te wiki. Me kī he tino tuku tautoko i roto i te reo Ingarihi engari tērā ētahi wā ka taea e te tūhono i a koe ki tētahi kaikōrero i tua atu i te reo Ingarihi. Taha pūtea: Mēnā ko te tikanga o te noho taratahi kua kore e taea e koe te mahi, e wātea ana he tautoko mā Te Manatū Whakahiato Ora i te 7 rā i te wiki, 8am ki te 5pm i 0800 559 009 me Whānau Ora i 0800 875 663 . Mēnā kei a koe tō tamaiti i tēnei wā, kua uru tonu ia ki roto i te noho rāhui a tō whare, ā, me mātua whai i aua ture 'noho ki te kāinga' anō. Mēnā e manaakitia e koe ō tamariki mō tētahi wā, ā, kua honoa, kua whānui ake rānei tō rāhui, me whai ngā tāngata katoa o tō rāhui kua whakakotahitia i aua ture anō o tōu whare – arā, ko te tikanga o tērā ka noho ngā tāngata katoa i roto i ngā whare e rua. Ka āhei tonu koe ki tētahi kaitiaki kia haere ake ki tō kāinga mēnā ko koe anake te tangata e tiakina ana, ā, me mau PPE ia. Kāore ia i te āhei ki te tiaki i ētahi atu tāngata nō whare kē. --- Section Separator --- Mēnā kei te hiahia kai koe, ota rongoā, ngā mea waiwai rānei me tono ki tētahi hoa, he kiritata rānei kia waiho ki waho o tō kūaha. --- Section Separator --- Mēnā i tae koe te wāhi pūtake i te wā kua whakatauhia, me mātua noho koe ki te kāinga. Ka taea anake e koe te wehe i te kāinga mēnā kei te haere koe kia aromatawaitia mō te KOWHEORI-19, mēnā rānei ka pā mai he ohotata, kei te noho mōrearea hoki koe. Me haere koe kia aromatawaitia: I muri tonu mai i tō mōhio he tangata koe i tātata I te 5 rā i muri mai i tō haerenga ki te wāhi pūtake Ā, me whiwhi aromatawai atu anō 12 rā i muri mai i tō haerenga ki te wāhi pūtake. I te wā kei te kāinga me noho wehe mai i ētahi atu tāngata i tō whare mēnā ka taea. Ka taea e koe te korikori tinana i waho, engari i tōu whare mēnā ka taea haumarutia wehe mai i ētahi atu. Tērā pea ko ngā mahi pērā i te hikihiki maitai i tō iari, te whakamahi taura pekepeke i tō ara kuhunga rānei. Kāore e uru mai ki tēnei ko ngā mahi i waho atu o tō kāinga, iari rānei pērā i te heri i te kurī ki te hīkoi i te takiwā noho. Mēnā he kaimahi waiwai koe, tē taea e koe te wehe i tō whare ki te haere ki te mahi. Mēnā i te wāhi pūtake koe, me noho taratahi koe i te kāinga mō te 14 rā i te iti rawa mai i tō pānga whakamutunga, ahakoa ka kitea e te aromatawai kāore koe i te mate. Me noho taratahi koe tae noa ki te waeatanga a Healthline ki a koe ki te whakaū i tō tukutanga mai i te noho taratahi i te rā 14. Mō ngā mōhiohio Pokapū Aromatawai me waea atu ki Healthline i 0800 358 5453 , haere rānei ki healthpoint.co.nz/covid-19 (external link) Mēnā kāore ō waka me waea atu ki tō rata, ā, tērā pea ka mahi tahi tō rata me ngā ratonga hapori ki te whakarite i tētahi aromatawai, ngā whakahaere aromatawai nekeneke rānei i ngā wāhi he nui te hiahia. Kāore he utu mō ngā aromatawai. Ko te tukanga noa mō ngā aromatawai e whakaatu ana kei te mate ka waea mai te Hauora Tūmatanui. Ka whakamōhiotia atu koe e rātau me aha koe ā muri ake. Ko te tikanga mēnā ka kitea e te aromatawai kāore koe i te mate ka whakamōhiotia atu koe mā te patowaea. Me noho ngā tāngata katoa o te whare ki te kāinga kia tohu rā anō te aromatawai rā 5 o te tangata i haere ki te wāhi pūtake kāore ia i te mate. Nō reira kāore koe i te āhei ki te puta ki te: hoko kai, te tiki kai rānei tiki rongoā, mō te whiwhi kano ārai mate rānei, ētahi atu pūtake rānei, (hāunga ngā whakamaimoa hauora whāwhai). Engari ka āhei koe ki te haere ki waho ki te: korikori tinana engari me haumaru te mahi, mā te noho tawhiti mai i ētahi atu. Tē taea e koe te wehe i tō whare ki te haere ki te mahi engari ia mēnā he kaimahi waiwai koe, ā, kei te ū koe ki ētahi āhuatanga ake. Me noho ngā tāngata katoa o te whare ki te kāinga mō te 5 rā i te iti rawa – kia whakaatu rā anō te aromatawai rā 5 o te tangata i haere ki te wāhi pūtake kāore ia i te mate. Mēnā ka pā mai ngā tohumate KOWHEORI-19 ki ētahi atu me waea atu ki Healthline i 0800 358 5453 , ka roa ake pea tō wā noho taratahi. Ehara i te mea me aromatawai ētahi atu tāngata o te whare, engari ia mēnā ka pā mai ngā tohumate ki a rātau, ka tonoa rānei rātau e ngā āpiha hauora. Mō ngā mōhiohio Pokapū Aromatawai me waea atu ki Healthline i 0800 358 5453 , haere rānei ki healthpoint.co.nz/covid-19 (external link) Mēnā kāore ō waka me waea atu ki tō rata, ā, tērā pea ka mahi tahi tō rata me ngā ratonga hapori ki te whakarite i tētahi aromatawai, ngā whakahaere aromatawai nekeneke rānei i ngā wāhi he nui te hiahia. Kāore he utu mō ngā aromatawai. Ko te tukanga noa mō ngā aromatawai e whakaatu ana kei te mate ka waea mai te Hauora Tūmatanui. Ka whakamōhiotia atu koe e rātau me aha koe ā muri ake. Ko te tikanga mēnā ka kitea e te aromatawai kāore koe i te mate ka whakamōhiotia atu koe mā te patowaea. Ko ētahi o ngā tohumate KOWHEORI-19 pea ko tētahi maremare hou, kino kē atu rānei, te kirikā, hēmanawa, mamae korokoro, heke te hūpē, kua kore rānei e rongo ā-ihu/ā-tāwara mō tētahi wā. Ka pā mai anō pea ki ētahi tāngata te mate tikotiko, ānini māhunga, mamae uaua, whakapairuaki, pōkaikaha, te kārangi rānei. Ki te pā mai ngā tohumate ki te tangata — ahakoa kua kitea e te aromatawai kāore koe i te mate — me wawe te waea atu ki Healthline kia aromatawaitia, me noho ki te kāinga, ā, me noho wehe i ētahi atu i tō kāinga mēnā ka taea. Me pēnei haere tonu tae noa ki te 24 haora i muri mai i te mutunga o ō tohumate, ā, kia whakaatu rā anō tō aromatawai kāore koe i te mate. Mēnā kei te uaua te hēhē, waea atu mō te waka tūroro: Waea ki 111 . Kia whakaatu rā anō te aromatawai rā 5 kāore te tangata i tae ki te wāhi pūtake i te mate, kaua rawa he tangata e wehe i tō whare ki te tiki kai, ētahi atu ō rānei. Ka taea e koe te tono tētahi hoa, he kiritata, he whanaunga rānei kia heria mai ō kai me ō rongoā ki tō kūaha. Engari, kāore koe e āhei ki te kōrero ki a ia, tētahi atu pānga rānei ki a ia i a ia i reira. Mēnā kāore he tohumate o ētahi atu i tō whare, ka āhei rātau ki te haere ki te hoko kai i muri i te whakaatu a te aromatawai rā 5 o te tangata i haere ki te wāhi pūtake kāore ia i te mate. Mēnā ko koe te tangata i haere ki tētahi wāhi pūtake, me mātua noho koe ki te kāinga kia whakaaetia rā anō koe e te Hauora Tūmatanui kei te āhei koe ki te wehe. Ka taea e koe te tono tuihono ngā kai mā ngā toa hokomaha paetata me tā rātau Ratonga Āwhina Whakaarotau. Ka taea te whakarato ngā tōtō kai ki tō kēti, tō kūaha rānei – haere ki familyservices.govt.nz (external link) ki te kimi i tētahi pātaka kai, waea atu rānei ki 0800 890 110 ki te ota i tētahi Kete Tautoko a Whānau Ora. Me noho wehe koe mai i ētahi atu o te whare ina taea. Kaua rawa e tuari rīhi, kapu, taputapu kai, pera, taora rānei me ētahi atu i tō whare. Me horoi i ō mea ki rō wai hopihopi wera. He mea nui tonu mō te hunga he tohumate ō rātau, i tae atu ki tētahi wāhi pūtake, he tangata i tātata, i aromatawaitia rānei mō te KOWHEORI-19 kia kaua rawa e haere ki tētahi pokapū kano ārai mate, kei roto i tēnei ko ngā tāngata o tō whare kei te noho i tō kāinga. Waea atu ki 0800 28 29 26 , haere rānei ki bookmyvaccine.nz ki te whakarite anō i tō wāhui. Mēnā he kaimahi hauora waiwai koe, he kaimahi paewhenua rānei, ā, e ū ana koe ki ētahi āhuatanga ake, ka āhei pea koe ki te mahi haere tonu. Torotoro ki a Healthline ki te tirotiro. Rongoā: Mēnā he ohotata, waea atu ki 111 . Mēnā ehara i te ohotata, me waea atu ki tō rata, ki Healthline rānei i 0800 358 5453 . Ngā tautoko hauora hinengaro me te oranga: He uaua pea te noho taratahi. E wātea ana he āwhina. Mēnā kei te hiahia tautoko koe, ka taea e koe te kōrero ki tētahi tumu kōrero – me waea atu, me patowaea rānei ki 1737 hei whakamahi i te ratonga ‘Need to Talk?’. He koreutu, ā, e wātea ana i te 24 haora i te rā, 7 rā i te wiki. Me kī he tino tuku tautoko i roto i te reo Ingarihi engari tērā ētahi wā ka taea e te tūhono i a koe ki tētahi kaikōrero i tua atu i te reo Ingarihi. Taha pūtea: Mēnā ko te tikanga o te noho taratahi kua kore e taea e koe te mahi, e wātea ana he tautoko mā Te Manatū Whakahiato Ora i te 7 rā i te wiki, 8am ki te 5pm i 0800 559 009 me Whānau Ora i 0800 875 663 . Mēnā kei a koe tō tamaiti i tēnei wā, kua uru tonu ia ki roto i te noho rāhui a tō whare, ā, me mātua whai i aua ture 'noho ki te kāinga' anō. Mēnā e manaakitia e koe ō tamariki mō tētahi wā, ā, kua honoa, kua whānui ake rānei tō rāhui, me whai ngā tāngata katoa o tō rāhui kua whakakotahitia i aua ture anō o tōu whare – arā, ko te tikanga o tērā ka noho ngā tāngata katoa i roto i ngā whare e rua. Ka āhei tonu koe ki tētahi kaitiaki kia haere ake ki tō kāinga mēnā ko koe anake te tangata e tiakina ana, ā, me mau PPE ia. Kāore ia i te āhei ki te tiaki i ētahi atu tāngata nō whare kē. --- Section Separator --- Information for Māori Support and information for Pacific Peoples Support and information for disabled people Support your community Alternate formats Translations አማርኛ | Amharic عربي | Arabic Bislama 简体中文 | Chinese (Simplified) 繁體中文 | Chinese (Traditional) Te Reo Māori Kuki ‘Āirani | Cook Islands Māori Español | Spanish دری | Dari فارسی | Farsi Vosa Vakaviti | Fijian ગુજરાતી | Gujarati हिन्दी / Hindi 日本語 | Japanese ကညီ | Karen Te taetae ni Kiribati | Kiribati 한국어 | Korean Bahasa Malaysia | Malay Vagahau Niue | Niuean پښتو | Pashto ਪੰਜਾਬੀ / Punjabi Rohingya Fäeag Rotuḁm | Rotuman Gagana Samoa | Samoan Solomon Aelan Pijin | Solomon Islands Pijin Af-Soomaali | Somali Kiswahili | Swahili Tagalog தமிழ் | Tamil Te reo Māori ภาษาไทย | Thai ትግርኛ | Tigrinya Tok Pisin Te Gagana Tokelau | Tokelauan Lea Faka Tonga | Tongan Te Gana Tuvalu | Tuvaluan اُردُو | Urdu Tiếng Việt | Vietnamese አማርኛ | Amharic عربي | Arabic Bislama 简体中文 | Chinese (Simplified) 繁體中文 | Chinese (Traditional) Te Reo Māori Kuki ‘Āirani | Cook Islands Māori Español | Spanish دری | Dari فارسی | Farsi Vosa Vakaviti | Fijian ગુજરાતી | Gujarati हिन्दी / Hindi 日本語 | Japanese ကညီ | Karen Te taetae ni Kiribati | Kiribati 한국어 | Korean Bahasa Malaysia | Malay Vagahau Niue | Niuean پښتو | Pashto ਪੰਜਾਬੀ / Punjabi Rohingya Fäeag Rotuḁm | Rotuman Gagana Samoa | Samoan Solomon Aelan Pijin | Solomon Islands Pijin Af-Soomaali | Somali Kiswahili | Swahili Tagalog தமிழ் | Tamil Te reo Māori ภาษาไทย | Thai ትግርኛ | Tigrinya Tok Pisin Te Gagana Tokelau | Tokelauan Lea Faka Tonga | Tongan Te Gana Tuvalu | Tuvaluan اُردُو | Urdu Tiếng Việt | Vietnamese
Home Iwi and communities Translations Te reo Māori Whakatewhatewha Pānga | Contact tracing Te āhua o te āwhina a te whakatewhatewha pānga | How contact tracing helps --- Section Separator --- Ko te whakatewhatewha pānga te huarahi o te kimi me te whakapā atu ki te tangata kua whakaraerae atu pea ki a KOWHEORI-19. Ina tohua kua pāngia te tangata e KOWHEORI-19, ka whakamahi te Manatū Hauora me ngā Poari Hauora ā-Rohe i ngā momo rauemi e kitea ai te hunga kua pāngia pea e ia, kua pāngia hoki pea e te mate. Kia tere ake tā tātou whakatewhatewha pānga, ka tere ake tā tātou aukati i te hōrapa o KOWHEORI-19. Hei āwhina i te aukati o te hōrapatanga, e tūtohu ana mātou kia puritia e koe he kōrero mō ō nekenekehanga, e whai wāhi ai; Te wāhi i haere rā koe. Te wā i haere rā koe. Te hunga i tūtakina rā e koe. Whakamahia rānei tētahi taupānga hei taunga mō ngā kōrero o ō nekenekehanga Me whai rātaka rānei, Me tiaki rānei tētahi rārangi ingoa ki tētahi wāhi e haumaru ana Me mahi whakaahua rānei e whakaatu ana i ngā wāhi kua torona e koe, me te wā i aua wāhi rā koe. Whakamahia te taupānga o NZ COVID Tracer , tōna puka-iti rānei mehemea ka taea, whakamahia rānei te huarahi e whai take ana ki a koe. Whakatenatenahia tō whānau me ō hoa kia pērā hoki rātou. Ko tā te taupānga whakatewhatewha a te Manatū Hauora, a ' NZ COVID Tracer ' he āwhina i a koe ki te waihanga i tētahi rātaka tahiko. E taea ana: te karapa ngā tohu QR e mana ana i ngā pakihi e whai wāhi mai ana te whakauru kōrero mō ngā wāhi kua torona e koe engari kāore nei he pānui whakaahua i reira e whakaatu ana i te tohu QR . He mea hoahoa te taupānga kia tiakina te matatapu ōu me ngā kōrero kua whakaurua e koe. Kāore ngā pārongo (hāunga ngā pārongo matakore ā-tauanga) ka tukuna e koe ki te Manatū e tohaina ki pokapū kāwanatanga kē, hāunga ngā wā e hāngai pū ana te whai wāhitanga mai o taua pokapū ki te urupare a te hauora tūmatanui, ā, e mātuatua ana hoki kia tohaina ngā pārongo mō ngā take o te haumaru tūmatanui i te wā o te mate urutā, o KOWHEORI-19. E kore e whakamahia hei take uruhi. Kia utaina ki tō pūrere, he tino iti noa iho te whakapaunga a te taupānga o NZ COVID Tracer i ngā hua e hono ai koe ki te ipurangi. Mēnā e āwangawanga koe ki te whakapaunga o ngā hua e hono ai koe ki te ipurangi, tērā pea ka hiahia koe kia hono rā anō ki te ahokore i mua i tō uta i te taupānga ki tō pūrere. Utaina te taupānga ki tō pūrere mai i Apple App Store rānei (external link) , i Google Play rānei (external link) . He kōrero anō mō te taupānga o NZ COVID Tracer (external link) Ki te kore koe e whakamahi i te taupānga o NZ COVID Tracer , ka pai tō whakamahi i te puka-iti o NZ COVID Tracer hei pupuri i tētahi rātaka ōkiko e mau nei ngā kōrero mō ngā wāhi kua tauria e koe. E 30 ngā whārangi o ia puka-iti, nō reira ka nui ērā mō tōna 1 marama. Mēnā ka whakamahia e koe te puka-iti, e tūtohu ana mātou: kia puritia e koe tō puka-iti e whakaurua ai ngā kōrero mō ō nekenekehanga ka wehe ana koe i te kāinga kia waitohu tonu i ngā rārangi ingoa mō te whakatewhatewha pānga ka toro ana koe ki ngā wāhi pēnei i te toa. Ka mate pea koe ki te panoni i ngā whakaritenga o tō pūrere tā e tāngia ai te maha o ngā whārangi e pīrangitia ana e koe. E 36 ngā whārangi A4 i te puka-iti o NZ COVID Tracer [PDF, 2.7 MB] E āhei ana te tono kia 10 ngā puka-iti i te mōkī. E āhei ana tō tono kape māu anō, hei tuari rānei ki tō hapori. E utukore ana ngā tono, ā, ka 2-3 wiki te roa e tae atu ai ngā mōkī ki a koe. Īmērahia tō ingoa, tō wāhi noho, me te maha o ngā pukapuka e whāia ana ki Covid19Response@dpmc.govt.nz He pārongo anō ā te Manatū Hauora mō te whakatewhatewha pānga. He taipitopito mō te whakatewhatewha pānga, mō te hunga pā tata me te hunga pā takiwā (external link) --- Section Separator --- Ko te whakatewhatewha pānga te huarahi o te kimi me te whakapā atu ki te tangata kua whakaraerae atu pea ki a KOWHEORI-19. E utukore ana ngā tono, ā, ka 2-3 wiki te roa e tae atu ai ngā mōkī ki a koe. He taipitopito mō te whakatewhatewha pānga, mō te hunga pā tata me te hunga pā takiwā (external link) --- Section Separator --- Information for Māori Support and information for Pacific Peoples Support and information for disabled people Support your community Alternate formats Translations አማርኛ | Amharic عربي | Arabic Bislama 简体中文 | Chinese (Simplified) 繁體中文 | Chinese (Traditional) Te Reo Māori Kuki ‘Āirani | Cook Islands Māori Español | Spanish دری | Dari فارسی | Farsi Vosa Vakaviti | Fijian ગુજરાતી | Gujarati हिन्दी / Hindi 日本語 | Japanese ကညီ | Karen Te taetae ni Kiribati | Kiribati 한국어 | Korean Bahasa Malaysia | Malay Vagahau Niue | Niuean پښتو | Pashto ਪੰਜਾਬੀ / Punjabi Rohingya Fäeag Rotuḁm | Rotuman Gagana Samoa | Samoan Solomon Aelan Pijin | Solomon Islands Pijin Af-Soomaali | Somali Kiswahili | Swahili Tagalog தமிழ் | Tamil Te reo Māori ภาษาไทย | Thai ትግርኛ | Tigrinya Tok Pisin Te Gagana Tokelau | Tokelauan Lea Faka Tonga | Tongan Te Gana Tuvalu | Tuvaluan اُردُو | Urdu Tiếng Việt | Vietnamese አማርኛ | Amharic عربي | Arabic Bislama 简体中文 | Chinese (Simplified) 繁體中文 | Chinese (Traditional) Te Reo Māori Kuki ‘Āirani | Cook Islands Māori Español | Spanish دری | Dari فارسی | Farsi Vosa Vakaviti | Fijian ગુજરાતી | Gujarati हिन्दी / Hindi 日本語 | Japanese ကညီ | Karen Te taetae ni Kiribati | Kiribati 한국어 | Korean Bahasa Malaysia | Malay Vagahau Niue | Niuean پښتو | Pashto ਪੰਜਾਬੀ / Punjabi Rohingya Fäeag Rotuḁm | Rotuman Gagana Samoa | Samoan Solomon Aelan Pijin | Solomon Islands Pijin Af-Soomaali | Somali Kiswahili | Swahili Tagalog தமிழ் | Tamil Te reo Māori ภาษาไทย | Thai ትግርኛ | Tigrinya Tok Pisin Te Gagana Tokelau | Tokelauan Lea Faka Tonga | Tongan Te Gana Tuvalu | Tuvaluan اُردُو | Urdu Tiếng Việt | Vietnamese
Home Iwi and communities Translations Te reo Māori Whakatewhatewha Pānga | Contact tracing Ngā wāhi whaipānga | Locations of interest --- Section Separator --- Ina puta he take hōrapa o te KOWHEORI-19 i te hapori, ka whakahoutia e Te Manatū Hauora tana pae tukutuku ki ngā wāhi i kitea ētahi kēhi tūturu o te KOWHEORI-19, ā ka kīia ēnei he ʻWāhi Whaipānga’. He mea nui tonu kia hihiratia mēnā i tae koe ki tētahi wāhi whaipānga i te wā i whakatauhia. Mēnā i tae koe, ka tuhia ngā mōhiohio i te taha o ia wāhi whaipānga o ngā mahi hei whai māhau. Ko ngā mahi me mahi koe kei te āhua o te mōrearea whakaraerae i ia wāhi. Mēnā kāore koe i tae ki tētahi o aua wāhi, ka tae kē atu ki tētahi o aua wāhi engari kīhai i reira i te wā i whakatauhia, me aroturuki koe i tō hauora, ā, me haere kia whakamātauria anake mēnā e whakaatu ana koe i ētahi tohumate. Ngā wāhi whaipānga (external link) --- Section Separator --- Ina puta he take hōrapa o te KOWHEORI-19 i te hapori, ka whakahoutia e Te Manatū Hauora tana pae tukutuku ki ngā wāhi i kitea ētahi kēhi tūturu o te KOWHEORI-19, ā ka kīia ēnei he ʻWāhi Whaipānga’. Ko ngā mahi me mahi koe kei te āhua o te mōrearea whakaraerae i ia wāhi. Mēnā kāore koe i tae ki tētahi o aua wāhi, ka tae kē atu ki tētahi o aua wāhi engari kīhai i reira i te wā i whakatauhia, me aroturuki koe i tō hauora, ā, me haere kia whakamātauria anake mēnā e whakaatu ana koe i ētahi tohumate. Home Iwi and communities Translations Te reo Māori Whakatewhatewha Pānga | Contact tracing Whakakā i te kimi Hono iarere | Turn on Bluetooth tracing --- Section Separator --- Kua whakahoutia te taupānga NZ COVID Tracer ki te hangarau kimi Hono iarere. Mā te kimi Hono iarere e āhei ai tō whiwhi i tētahi whakaohiti mēnā kua whakapā tata koe ki tētahi atu kaiwhakamahi taupānga ka pāngia e te KOWHEORI-19. Ehara i te mea whakakapi te kimi Hono iarere i ngā tukanga kimi pāpātanga o nāianei, i ngā waehere QR NZ COVID Tracer rānei. Kei te whai tikanga tonu te mahi matawai i ngā waehere QR ki te aroturuki i ō haerenga. He mea tāpiri te utauta kimi Hono iarere — māna e āwhina ki te kimi tāngata kua whakapā tata mai ki a tātou. Mā te whakakā tonu i te kimi Hono iarere, ka tukuna tētahi waehere ID tupurangi, he matatapu, he haumaru. He rite ki te papakitanga a ngā ringa ā-matihiko i waenga i ngā waea kawe kei te pā tata mai. Mā te āheinga kimi e hopu ai i pēhea nei te tata mai a tētahi atu waea, ā, i pēhea nei te roa. Ko ngā waea ka whakapā mai me kā mai anō te kimi Hono iarere hoki. Mā tēnei e kite ai ina pāngia ai tētahi ki te KOWHEORI-19, ka āhei ia ki te tuku i tētahi whakamōhiotanga kirimuna ko ngā waehere ID tupurangi kei roto i ngā mea kua tukuna atu e ngā waea kawe i roto i ngā rā 14 kua hori. Ki te mōhio tō waea ki tētahi o ēnei waehere ID kua whakapā tata rawa ki a koe, ka mutu, kua roa tō noho atu mō te tūpono pāngia e te mate, ka whiwhi whakaohiti koe. Mā tēnei whakaohiti koe e tohutohu ki ngā mahi e noho haumaru ai koe me tō whānau. Mātakitaki i te kiriata kimi Hono iarere i tēnei whārangi kia kitea ai tana mahi. (external link) Ko tā te nuinga o ngā waea kawe he whakahou aunoa i te taupānga. Ka āhei hoki koe ki te whakahou ake ā-ringa i te taupānga i te toa taupānga, i te toa pūrei rānei. Kia whakahou ake rawa, mā te taupānga koe e ui mēnā me whakakā ake te kimi Hono iarere. Ka kā rawa mai, ka mahi tonu i tāna mahi ahakoa kua kati te taupānga. Kāore te kimi Hono iarere e whakamahi i ngā raraunga kawekawe, kāore hoki e whakamimiti i te pūhiko nā te mea he Ngao Iti Hono iarere. Mā tō whakahohe i te kimi Hono iarere, ka tiakina tō matatapu i ngā wā katoa — kāore e taea te whakaatu tō tauwāhi, tō ingoa, ētahi kōrero rānei e pā ana ki a koe. Kāore hoki te Hono iarere e hopu ko wai mā i whakapā tata mai, ā, i whea rānei koe. Ko te tikanga mēnā ka whiwhi koe i tētahi whakaohiti inā hoki kua whakapā tata koe ki tētahi atu kua pāngia e te KOWHEORI-19, kāore he tāngata i tua atu i a koe e mōhio kua riro i a koe. Ko ngā mōhiohio katoa a te kimi pāpātanga kua hopukina ki te taupānga ka mau mārika ki tō waea kawe, ā, kei a koe te tikanga i ngā wā katoa ki te āhua o ngā mōhiohio ka tohua e koe hei tuari. --- Section Separator --- Kua whakahoutia te taupānga NZ COVID Tracer ki te hangarau kimi Hono iarere. Home Iwi and communities Translations Te reo Māori Ngā pārongo mō te Mate Korona | Information about COVID-19 Te huaketo o te KOWHEORI-19 me ngā tohumate | The COVID-19 virus and symptoms --- Section Separator --- He mate korona hou te KOWHEORI-19 ka pā pea ki ō pūkahukahu me ō arahau. He maha ngā momo mate korona e puta ai ngā māuiuitanga pēnei i te maremare noa iho nei. maremare e hou ana, e kino kē ake ana rānei kirikā kāore e iti iho ana i te tohurau e 38 ( 38°C ) huatare o te manawa mātihetihe me te ihu hūpē korenga o te ihu e rongo ana i te kakara. Ina pāngia koe e ēnei tohumate, ehara pea i te mea kua āta pāngia koe e te KOWHEORI-19. Tērā pea kua pāngia kētia koe e tētahi mate e hōrapa ake ana, pēnei i te maremare, i te rewharewha rānei. Ko te huatare o te manawa tētahi tohu pea o te pūkahu kakā, ā, me mātua tirotiro e te tākuta. Mehemea kua pāngia koe e ngā tohumate o te maremare, o te rewharewha, o te KOWHEORI-19 rānei me waea atu ki tō tākuta, ki Healthline rānei i 0800 611 116 ki te whiwhi tohutohu kia whakamātauria ai koe. Tērā pea kua pāngia ētahi tāngata e ngā tohumate kāore e pērā rawa ana te hōrapa, pēnei i ēnei noa iho nei, i te: kirikā tikotiko māhunga ānini uaua mamae whakapai ruaki me te ruaki rangirua me te hōhā. Kāore anō mātou kia mōhio ki te roa o te wā ka hipa i mua i te kitenga o ngā tohumate mai i te pānga o te tangata. E ai ki te Kāhui Hauora o te Ao, kei te 2 – 10 rā tōna roa. Ka rere te KOWHEORI-19 mā ngā kōpata i tētahi tangata ki tētahi atu. Ka pāngia e te tangata mā ō rātou karu, mā ō rātou ihu, mā ō rātou waha hoki. Ka maremare ana rānei, ka matihe ana rānei, ka kōrero ana rānei tētahi kua pāngia e te mate, ka rere atu pea i a ia ngā kōpata kei roto rā te huaketo. He rahi rawa ēnei kōpata kia roa tonu te rere i te takiwā, nō reira ka tau ki runga i ngā mata huri noa. --- Section Separator --- He mate korona hou te KOWHEORI-19 ka pā pea ki ō pūkahukahu me ō arahau. Ka maremare ana rānei, ka matihe ana rānei, ka kōrero ana rānei tētahi kua pāngia e te mate, ka rere atu pea i a ia ngā kōpata kei roto rā te huaketo. He rahi rawa ēnei kōpata kia roa tonu te rere i te takiwā, nō reira ka tau ki runga i ngā mata huri noa. --- Section Separator --- Information for Māori Support and information for Pacific Peoples Support and information for disabled people Support your community Alternate formats Translations አማርኛ | Amharic عربي | Arabic Bislama 简体中文 | Chinese (Simplified) 繁體中文 | Chinese (Traditional) Te Reo Māori Kuki ‘Āirani | Cook Islands Māori Español | Spanish دری | Dari فارسی | Farsi Vosa Vakaviti | Fijian ગુજરાતી | Gujarati हिन्दी / Hindi 日本語 | Japanese ကညီ | Karen Te taetae ni Kiribati | Kiribati 한국어 | Korean Bahasa Malaysia | Malay Vagahau Niue | Niuean پښتو | Pashto ਪੰਜਾਬੀ / Punjabi Rohingya Fäeag Rotuḁm | Rotuman Gagana Samoa | Samoan Solomon Aelan Pijin | Solomon Islands Pijin Af-Soomaali | Somali Kiswahili | Swahili Tagalog தமிழ் | Tamil Te reo Māori ภาษาไทย | Thai ትግርኛ | Tigrinya Tok Pisin Te Gagana Tokelau | Tokelauan Lea Faka Tonga | Tongan Te Gana Tuvalu | Tuvaluan اُردُو | Urdu Tiếng Việt | Vietnamese አማርኛ | Amharic عربي | Arabic Bislama 简体中文 | Chinese (Simplified) 繁體中文 | Chinese (Traditional) Te Reo Māori Kuki ‘Āirani | Cook Islands Māori Español | Spanish دری | Dari فارسی | Farsi Vosa Vakaviti | Fijian ગુજરાતી | Gujarati हिन्दी / Hindi 日本語 | Japanese ကညီ | Karen Te taetae ni Kiribati | Kiribati 한국어 | Korean Bahasa Malaysia | Malay Vagahau Niue | Niuean پښتو | Pashto ਪੰਜਾਬੀ / Punjabi Rohingya Fäeag Rotuḁm | Rotuman Gagana Samoa | Samoan Solomon Aelan Pijin | Solomon Islands Pijin Af-Soomaali | Somali Kiswahili | Swahili Tagalog தமிழ் | Tamil Te reo Māori ภาษาไทย | Thai ትግርኛ | Tigrinya Tok Pisin Te Gagana Tokelau | Tokelauan Lea Faka Tonga | Tongan Te Gana Tuvalu | Tuvaluan اُردُو | Urdu Tiếng Việt | Vietnamese
Home Iwi and communities Translations Te reo Māori Ngā pārongo mō te Mate Korona | Information about COVID-19 He mea nui te whai i te pārongo tika | Getting the right information matters --- Section Separator --- He wā ōna ka whakaputaina he pārongo hei whakapōhēhē, hei whakahiwa rānei i te tangata. Ka pēnei ana te whakaputaina, ka kīia i ōna wā he rongo teka rānei, he whakapōhēhētanga rānei, he ariā kara rānei. Ko te whakapōhēhētanga tētahi hoariri o tātou i te wā me ngātahi kē te mahi hei patu i te huaketo. Mā te whakapōhēhētanga pea e hōrapa ai te wehi rānei, te rangirua rānei, e aukati ai rānei tā te tangata mahi i te mahi e tika ana. Tē taea e tātou te whakapōhēhētanga te whakakore, engari e kaha ana tātou ki te āwhina i a tātou anō kia kitea ai taua āhuatanga. He rite tonu tana: ahu mai i tētahi e huna nei tōna ingoa ake kī mai he pārongo kei a ia nō roto i ngā pokapū kāwanatanga, engari kāore e tautuhia te puna kī mai e whāngai pārongo ana ia kua hunaia i te marea, kāore rānei ngā āpiha e pīrangi nei kia mōhiotia e koe kī mai i te nuinga o te wā, ko te ‘kōrero houtupu’ e kino ake ana i te pārongo e whaimana ana. I tētahi wā pēnei: kia mataara koe ki ngā pārongo ka arohia e koe tirohia te kounga o te pārongo i mua i tō tuku ki ētahi atu. Ko ngā kōrero pono hei whai māu kei ā te kāwanatanga kōrero whakarāpopoto ki te ao pāpāho, kei ana pae tukutuku, kei ana hōngere pae pāpori hoki. Ko ngā kōrero hei āwhina kia mārama, kia tautuhia hoki ngā rongo teka kei konei (external link) --- Section Separator --- He wā ōna ka whakaputaina he pārongo hei whakapōhēhē, hei whakahiwa rānei i te tangata. Home Iwi and communities Translations Te reo Māori Ngā pārongo mō te Mate Korona | Information about COVID-19 Te momo Delta | The Delta variant --- Section Separator --- He tikanga noa te huringa, te irakētanga rānei o ngā wheori. Kua rerekē te āhua o te wheori KOWHEORI-19 i te hekenga o te wā, i a ia e urutau ana ki te tangata. Nā tēnei i hua mai ai ngā momo hou o te wheori, tae atu ki te momo Delta. Ka whai pānga pea te tere o te horanga o te wheori i ngā momo rerekē o te KOWHEORI-19, te āhua rānei o te kaha o te māuiui o te tangata i te wheori. Kua tere te hora puta noa i te ao o te momo Delta, ā, koinei tonu te momo matua i ngā whenua maha. Koinei te taurangi mama rawa ki te whakawhiti, otirā he māmā ake tana horanga ki tērā o te momo tuatahi o te wheori KOWHEORI-19, me ētahi atu momo taurangi. He rerekē te Delta i te mea mō ngā tāngata e pāngia ana: ka kino ake te whanaketanga o ngā māuiuitanga KOWHEORI-19 i ētahi atu momo o te wheori he nui ake te mōrearea ka whakaurua atu ki rō hōhipera te āhua nei he nui ake te kawenga o te wheori (he kawenga wheori nui ake) ā, he roa ake te wā e kawea ana, tērā i ētahi atu momo kāore pea ōna tohumate (he tohumate-kore) ina maunoa taua mate he nui ake te tūpono whakapoke i ētahi atu - ko te whakatau tata, ko te toharite, kotahi te tangata e pokea ana e te Delta, tērā pea ka tuku ki te 5, 6 tāngata atu anō rānei ka poto ake pea te wā mai i te whakaraerae ki te wheori me te kitenga o ngā tohumate tuatahi. Mā te kitenga wawe i ngā kēhi, te whai i ngā tapuwae, me te whakataratahi i ngā kēhi me ā rātou pānga, he waiwai ki te whakamutu i te horanga o ngā momo katoa o te KOWHEORI-19. Ka taea e tātou te takahi wawe atu i ngā pakarutanga ki ngā hapori mā te: Whai i ngā ture Pae Mataara . Me mau ārai kanohi i ngā wā e herea ana e ngā ture Pae Mataara. Te noho tawhiti ā-tinana i te 2m mēnā ka taea. Te noho ki te kāinga mēnā he tohumate KOWHEORI-19 ōu me te waea atu ki Healthline i runga i te 0800 358 5453 mō ngā tohutohu mō te rapu whakamātautau . Te whai haere i ngā wāhi kua tae koe mā te whakamahi i te taupānga NZ COVID Tracer ki te matawai i ngā waehere QR, mā te tuhi rānei i ngā tuhipoka āmiki. Mā te whakakā te whaiwhai hono iarere i te taupānga NZ COVID Tracer. Mā te whiwhi i ngā kano ārai mate e rua, ka whai ārainga nui koe i te pokenga Delta, ā, he ārainga nui ake hoki i te mate taumaha, te noho hōhipera me te mate tonu atu. I tēnei wā e whakaatu ana ngā taunakitanga, he 88% te whaihuatanga o ngā pota e rua o te kano ārai mate Pfizer i te mate i te pokenga Delta. Ko te āraitanga i te urunga ki te hōhipera nā te pokenga Delta, he āhua 96%. He kore utu te kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19, he mahi tūao, ā, e wātea ana ki ngā tāngata katoa o Aotearoa kei tua i te 12 tau te pakeke. Kāore he aha o tō tūnga kōkota, kirirarau rānei. Haere ki Book My Vaccine (external link) waea atu rānei ki te COVID Vaccination Healthline ( 0800 28 29 26 ) ki te whakarite tāpui. He kore utu ngā waea katoa, ā, e wātea ana te rōpū mai i te 8am ki te 8pm, e whitu rā i te wiki. Ka taea e koe te tono kaiwhakamāori ki te hiahiatia tētahi. Kāore tētahi kano āraimate e eke ki te 100% te whaihuatanga, nō reira he tūponotanga anō kei pāngia tētahi tangata whai kano ārai mate ki te momo Delta, me te tuku i te wheori ki ētahi atu. Nō reira me whakamahi i ngā āhuatanga katoa e wātea ana, tae atu ki te kano ārai mate, ki te tiaki i a tātou me ō tātou hapori i te mate. --- Section Separator --- He tikanga noa te huringa, te irakētanga rānei o ngā wheori. Ka āwhina ngā ārai kanohi ki te whakaiti i te horanga o te KOWHEORI-19. Ka āwhina ki te aukati i te rerenga o ngā pata i te wā e kōrero ana, e kata ana, e maremare ana, e matihe ana hoki te tangata. Ka hāngai hoki ki tēnei ngā tāngata e pāngia ana e te KOWHEORI-19 engari e ora ana te āhua, otirā kāore he tohumate mārama. --- Section Separator --- Ka āwhina ngā ārai kanohi ki te whakaiti i te horanga o te KOWHEORI-19. Ka āwhina ki te aukati i te rerenga o ngā pata i te wā e kōrero ana, e kata ana, e maremare ana, e matihe ana hoki te tangata. Ka hāngai hoki ki tēnei ngā tāngata e pāngia ana e te KOWHEORI-19 engari e ora ana te āhua, otirā kāore he tohumate mārama.
Home Iwi and communities Translations Te reo Māori Te tiaki i tō hapori | Protecting your community Ngā ārai kanohi me ngā maruhā | Face coverings and masks --- Section Separator --- E akiaki ana mātou i a koe ki te mau ārai kanohi mēnā kāore e taea te tū tawhiti atu i tētahi atu, hei tauira, i ngā wāhi kōpā i rō whare. Me mātua mau ā-ture koe i tētahi ārai kanohi: i runga waka kawe tūmatanui i runga i ngā rerenga Me mātua mau ā-ture koe i tētahi ārai kanohi mēnā ko koe te kaihautū o tētahi: tēkehi, waka kawe-tiri waka kawe tūmatanui. Me mātua mau ā-ture koe i tētahi ārai kanohi: kei runga koe i ngā waka kawe tūmatanui, ngā rererangi (tae atu ki ngā wāhi wehe, taunga rānei pēnei i ngā teihana tereina me ngā tūnga pahi) i roto hoki i ngā tēkehi, waka kawe-tiri rānei. e toro atu ana koe ki tētahi whare hauora, tiaki kaumātua rānei i roto hoki i ngā pakihi hokohoko, pēnei i ngā hokomaha, ngā kēmehi, ngā mōro, ngā mākete rō whare, ngā toa ō rangaranga, me ngā wāhi tūmatanui pēnei i ngā whare pupuri taonga me ngā whare pukapuka te haere ki ngā wāhi tūmatanui i roto i ngā kōti me ngā taraipiunara, ngā tari kaunihera, kāwanatanga hoki, me ngā kaiwhakarato ratonga whai taupaepae kiritaki. Me mātua mau ā-ture koe i tētahi ārai kanohi mēnā: e mahi ana koe i tētahi wāhi anga tūmatanui o tētahi kōti, taraipiunara, tari kaunihera, kāwanatanga rānei, kaiwhakarato ratonga pāpori rānei he kaihautū kawe taputapu ki ngā wāhitau kāinga - me mau noa ngā kaihautū kawe taputapu i te ārai kanohi i te wā kei waho ia i tōna waka e mahi ana koe i tētahi kawhe, wharekai, whare waipiro, whare kanikani, whare whāngai rawakore, tētahi atu pakihi inu me te kai rānei i te tūranga anga ki ngā kiritaki e mahi ana koe mā tētahi ratonga pānga tata - hei tauira, ngā kaikuti makawe, kaihaumanu rerehua rānei e mahi ana i tētahi toa hokohoko - tae atu ki ērā i te tuwhera i ngā Pae Mataara 3 me te 4 e mahi ana i tētahi whare tūmatanui - hei tauira, whare pukapuka, whare taonga, whare kori - kāore e mate ngā kaimahi puna kaukau ki te mau ārai kanohi. he kaihautū tēkehi, waka kawe-tiri, poti kawe, pahi, tereina rānei mō ngā kawenga tūmatanui - kāore ngā pahi kura, poti kawe rānei i waenga i Te Ika-a-Māui me Te Waipounamu e uru ki tēnei. E akiaki ana mātou i a koe ki te mau ārai kanohi, me te noho kia 2m te tawhiti i ētahi atu i tō wehenga i te kāinga. Inarā mēnā he uaua ki te noho tawhiti i ētahi atu. Hei tauira, i te kohinga o ngā ō rangaranga. Me mātua mau ā-ture koe i tētahi ārai kanohi: i runga i ngā waka tūmatanui, i te wāhi wehenga, taenga rānei, hei tauira, ngā taunga rererangi, ngā teihana tereina me ngā tūnga pahi i runga rerenga i ngā tēkehi me ngā waka kawe-tiri i te toronga ki ngā whare hauora i te toronga ki ngā whare tiaki kaumātua mēnā he kiritaki koe i tētahi pakihi, ratonga rānei e mahi ana i ēnei pae mataara, hei tauira, ngā hokomaha, kēmehi me ngā karāti mēnā e toro ana ki ngā wāhi tūmatanui i roto i ngā kōti me ngā taraipiunara, ngā tari kaunihera, kāwanatanga hoki, me ngā kaiwhakarato ratonga whai taupaepae kiritaki. Me mau ā-ture koe i tētahi ārai kanohi mēnā he kaimahi koe e whai pānga ana ki ngā kiritaki i tētahi pakihi, ratonga rānei e mahi ana i te Pae Mataara 3. Me mau ārai kanohi koe mēnā e mahi ana koe i: tētahi hokomaha, toa, karāti, kaihoko waipiro, kēmehi, pātaka koha kai, whare horoi kaka whaiaro, toa hoko taputapu mārō, toa hoko mīti, toa hoko ika, toa hoko huawhenua me te huarākau, mōro, pēke, New Zealand Post rānei tētahi wāhi anga tūmatanui o tētahi kōti, taraipiunara, tari kaunihera, kāwanatanga rānei, kaiwhakarato ratonga pāpori rānei he kaihautū kawe taputapu ki ngā wāhitau kāinga - me mau noa ngā kaihautū kawe taputapu i te ārai kanohi i te wā kei waho ia i tōna waka he kaihautū tēkehi, waka kawe-tiri, poti kawe, pahi, tereina rānei mō ngā kawenga tūmatanui - kāore koe e mate ki te mau ārai kanohi i ngā pahi kura, poti kawe rānei i waenga i Te Ika-a-Māui me Te Waipounamu e uru ki tēnei. E akiaki ana mātou i a koe ki te mau ārai kanohi, me te noho kia 2m te tawhiti i ētahi atu i tō wehenga i te kāinga. Inarā mēnā he uaua ki te noho tawhiti i ētahi atu. Hei tauira, i te kohinga o ngā ō rangaranga. Me mātua mau ā-ture koe i tētahi ārai kanohi: i runga i ngā waka tūmatanui, i te wāhi wehenga, taenga rānei, hei tauira, ngā taunga rererangi, ngā teihana tereina me ngā tūnga pahi i runga rerenga i ngā tēkehi me ngā waka kawe-tiri i te toronga ki ngā whare hauora i te toronga ki ngā whare tiaki kaumātua mēnā he kiritaki koe i tētahi pakihi, ratonga rānei e mahi ana i ēnei pae mataara, hei tauira, ngā hokomaha, kēmehi me ngā karāti mēnā e toro ana ki ngā wāhi tūmatanui i roto i ngā kōti me ngā taraipiunara, ngā tari kaunihera, kāwanatanga hoki, me ngā kaiwhakarato ratonga whai taupaepae kiritaki. Me mau ā-ture koe i tētahi ārai kanohi mēnā he kaimahi koe e whai pānga ana ki ngā kiritaki i tētahi pakihi, ratonga rānei e mahi ana i te Pae Mataara 4. Me mau ārai kanohi koe mēnā e mahi ana koe i: tētahi hokomaha, toa, karāti, kaihoko waipiro, kēmehi, pātaka koha kai, whare horoi kaka whaiaro, toa hoko tautara rānei tētahi wāhi anga tūmatanui o tētahi kōti, taraipiunara, tari kaunihera, kāwanatanga rānei, kaiwhakarato ratonga pāpori rānei he kaihautū tēkehi, waka kawe-tiri, poti kawe, pahi, tereina rānei mō ngā kawenga tūmatanui - kāore koe e mate ki te mau ārai kanohi i ngā poti kawe i waenga i Te Ika-a-Māui me Te Waipounamu e uru ki tēnei. E mōhio ana mātou kāore pea e āhei ētahi tāngata whai āhuatanga hauā, āhuatanga hauora rānei, te mau haumaru, hāneanea rānei i ngā ārai kanohi. Kia mahara koe ki tēnei āhuatanga. E whai āheinga tonu ana rātou ki ngā ratonga kai, kēmehi me ētahi atu ratonga. Mēnā e taea ana, ka akiakitia koe ki te mau i tētahi ārai kanohi. Ko te mau ārai kanohi kāore e hiahiatia: e ngā tamariki i raro i te 12 tau e ngā ākonga i runga pahi kura i ngā ratonga waka kawe pāhihi i waenga i Te Ika-a-Māui me Te Waipounamu i runga poti, kaipuke rānei kāore he wāhi tāparepare mā ngā pāhihi, hei tauira, ngā haerenga waka torohaki i runga haerenga rēti waka, ā-rōpū rānei i runga rerenga tūmataiti e ngā kaihautū waka, rererangi, kaimahi rānei o te ratonga mēnā kei tētahi wāhi tūwehe atu i ngā pāhihi, hei tauira ngā kaihautū rererangi, ngā kaihautū tereina rānei. Kāore hoki koe e mate ki te mau ārai kanohi mēnā: kāore i te haumaru, hei tauira, mēnā kāore e taea e te kaihautū te hautū haumaru i tētahi waka he ohotata he māuiuitanga hauora hinengaro, tinana rānei, he mate, he hauātanga rānei tōu kāore e tika ana kia mau i te ārai kanohi me whakapūmau koe i tō tuakiri me whakawhiti kōrero koe ki tētahi tangata turi, uaua rānei te rongo me kai rongoā koe me kai, me inu rānei koe mēnā e whakaaetia ana te inu me te kai kāore e herea ana e te ture E mōhio ana mātou kāore pea e āhei ētahi tāngata whai āhuatanga hauā, āhuatanga hauora rānei, te mau haumaru, hāneanea rānei i ngā ārai kanohi. Ki te kore e taea e koe te mau i tētahi, ka taea e koe te tiki kāri awere. Ka taea e koe te whakaatu i tō kāri awere i ngā wā e hiahia ana. Ka taea e koe te tono kāri i te Disabled Persons Assembly NZ mā te whakapā atu ki a rātou i 04 801 9100 i info@dpa.org.nz rānei. Me mātua whai kia: mā maroke karukaru kore. mā maroke karukaru kore. I mua i tō mau i tō uwhi mata, horoia, whakamaroketia hoki ō ringaringa. Whakamahia ko te: hopi me te wai rānei patuero ā-ringa rānei (kia kaua e iti iho i te 60% te nui o te waipiro). hopi me te wai rānei patuero ā-ringa rānei (kia kaua e iti iho i te 60% te nui o te waipiro). Tukuna kia tūpoki te uwhi mata i tō ihu me tō waha, ka whakakikīngia ai mā ngā here rānei, mā ngā koropewa ā-taringa rānei. Ko te uwhi mata me: tūpoki katoa i tō ihu, i tō waha me tō kauwae hāneanea te mautanga, engari me piri hoki ki ngā taha o tō kanohi tuku kia māmā noa iho tō hā tūpoki katoa i tō ihu, i tō waha me tō kauwae hāneanea te mautanga, engari me piri hoki ki ngā taha o tō kanohi tuku kia māmā noa iho tō hā Horoia anō ō ringaringa. Whakamahia ko te: hopi me te wai rānei patuero ā-ringa rānei (kia kaua e iti iho i te 60% te nui o te waipiro). hopi me te wai rānei patuero ā-ringa rānei (kia kaua e iti iho i te 60% te nui o te waipiro). Parea te pānga ki te wāhanga o mua o tō uwhi mata, ki tō kanohi tonu rānei Parea te nekehanga o tō uwhi mata, tae atu ki te kumetanga ki raro iho i tō kauwae Whakakapia ki uwhi mata kē mehemea kua haukū, kua taretare, kua paruparu rānei. Horoia, whakamaroketia hoki ō ringaringa. Whakamahia ko te: hopi me te wai rānei patuero ā-ringa rānei (kia kaua e iti iho i te 60% te nui o te waipiro). hopi me te wai rānei patuero ā-ringa rānei (kia kaua e iti iho i te 60% te nui o te waipiro). Tangohia tō uwhi mata. Tangohia mai i muri, ka kumea atu ai i tō kanohi. Whakamahia ngā koropewa rānei, wetekina rānei ngā here. Kaua e pā ki te wāhanga o mua o te uwhi mata, ki ō karu, ki tō ihu, ki tō waha hoki. Horoia rānei, rukea atu rānei tō uwhi mata. Horoia ngā uwhi mata kua hangā i te papanga mā te pūrere horoi kākahu me te hopi kia 60 tohurau te wera o te wai. Āta whakamaroketia i mua i te whakamahinga anō. Kaua e whakamahia tētahi uwhi mata e haukū ana. Rukea atu ngā uwhi mata e rangitahi nei te whakamahia. Raua atu ki tētahi ipu para e whai taupoki ana, ki tētahi pēke whai piringa rānei, ka whiua atu ai. Kaua e whakamahia anō, e whai rānei ki te patu i ngā huaketo o ngā uwhi mata e rangitahi nei te whakamahia. Horoia ngā uwhi mata kua hangā i te papanga mā te pūrere horoi kākahu me te hopi kia 60 tohurau te wera o te wai. Āta whakamaroketia i mua i te whakamahinga anō. Kaua e whakamahia tētahi uwhi mata e haukū ana. Rukea atu ngā uwhi mata e rangitahi nei te whakamahia. Raua atu ki tētahi ipu para e whai taupoki ana, ki tētahi pēke whai piringa rānei, ka whiua atu ai. Kaua e whakamahia anō, e whai rānei ki te patu i ngā huaketo o ngā uwhi mata e rangitahi nei te whakamahia. Horoia anō ō ringaringa mā te whakamahi i te: hopi me te wai rānei patuero ā-ringa rānei (kia kaua e iti iho i te 60% te nui o te waipiro). hopi me te wai rānei patuero ā-ringa rānei (kia kaua e iti iho i te 60% te nui o te waipiro). --- Section Separator --- E akiaki ana mātou i a koe ki te mau ārai kanohi mēnā kāore e taea te tū tawhiti atu i tētahi atu, hei tauira, i ngā wāhi kōpā i rō whare. Hei tauira, i te kohinga o ngā ō rangaranga. Me mātua mau ā-ture koe i tētahi ārai kanohi: i runga i ngā waka tūmatanui, i te wāhi wehenga, taenga rānei, hei tauira, ngā taunga rererangi, ngā teihana tereina me ngā tūnga pahi i runga rerenga i ngā tēkehi me ngā waka kawe-tiri i te toronga ki ngā whare hauora i te toronga ki ngā whare tiaki kaumātua mēnā he kiritaki koe i tētahi pakihi, ratonga rānei e mahi ana i ēnei pae mataara, hei tauira, ngā hokomaha, kēmehi me ngā karāti mēnā e toro ana ki ngā wāhi tūmatanui i roto i ngā kōti me ngā taraipiunara, ngā tari kaunihera, kāwanatanga hoki, me ngā kaiwhakarato ratonga whai taupaepae kiritaki. Me mau ā-ture koe i tētahi ārai kanohi mēnā he kaimahi koe e whai pānga ana ki ngā kiritaki i tētahi pakihi, ratonga rānei e mahi ana i te Pae Mataara 4. Me mau ārai kanohi koe mēnā e mahi ana koe i: tētahi hokomaha, toa, karāti, kaihoko waipiro, kēmehi, pātaka koha kai, whare horoi kaka whaiaro, toa hoko tautara rānei tētahi wāhi anga tūmatanui o tētahi kōti, taraipiunara, tari kaunihera, kāwanatanga rānei, kaiwhakarato ratonga pāpori rānei he kaihautū tēkehi, waka kawe-tiri, poti kawe, pahi, tereina rānei mō ngā kawenga tūmatanui - kāore koe e mate ki te mau ārai kanohi i ngā poti kawe i waenga i Te Ika-a-Māui me Te Waipounamu e uru ki tēnei. E mōhio ana mātou kāore pea e āhei ētahi tāngata whai āhuatanga hauā, āhuatanga hauora rānei, te mau haumaru, hāneanea rānei i ngā ārai kanohi. Kia mahara koe ki tēnei āhuatanga. E whai āheinga tonu ana rātou ki ngā ratonga kai, kēmehi me ētahi atu ratonga. Mēnā e taea ana, ka akiakitia koe ki te mau i tētahi ārai kanohi. Ko te mau ārai kanohi kāore e hiahiatia: e ngā tamariki i raro i te 12 tau e ngā ākonga i runga pahi kura i ngā ratonga waka kawe pāhihi i waenga i Te Ika-a-Māui me Te Waipounamu i runga poti, kaipuke rānei kāore he wāhi tāparepare mā ngā pāhihi, hei tauira, ngā haerenga waka torohaki i runga haerenga rēti waka, ā-rōpū rānei i runga rerenga tūmataiti e ngā kaihautū waka, rererangi, kaimahi rānei o te ratonga mēnā kei tētahi wāhi tūwehe atu i ngā pāhihi, hei tauira ngā kaihautū rererangi, ngā kaihautū tereina rānei. Kāore hoki koe e mate ki te mau ārai kanohi mēnā: kāore i te haumaru, hei tauira, mēnā kāore e taea e te kaihautū te hautū haumaru i tētahi waka he ohotata he māuiuitanga hauora hinengaro, tinana rānei, he mate, he hauātanga rānei tōu kāore e tika ana kia mau i te ārai kanohi me whakapūmau koe i tō tuakiri me whakawhiti kōrero koe ki tētahi tangata turi, uaua rānei te rongo me kai rongoā koe me kai, me inu rānei koe mēnā e whakaaetia ana te inu me te kai kāore e herea ana e te ture E mōhio ana mātou kāore pea e āhei ētahi tāngata whai āhuatanga hauā, āhuatanga hauora rānei, te mau haumaru, hāneanea rānei i ngā ārai kanohi. Ki te kore e taea e koe te mau i tētahi, ka taea e koe te tiki kāri awere. Ka taea e koe te whakaatu i tō kāri awere i ngā wā e hiahia ana. Ka taea e koe te tono kāri i te Disabled Persons Assembly NZ mā te whakapā atu ki a rātou i 04 801 9100 i info@dpa.org.nz rānei. Me mātua whai kia: mā maroke karukaru kore. mā maroke karukaru kore. I mua i tō mau i tō uwhi mata, horoia, whakamaroketia hoki ō ringaringa. Whakamahia ko te: hopi me te wai rānei patuero ā-ringa rānei (kia kaua e iti iho i te 60% te nui o te waipiro). hopi me te wai rānei patuero ā-ringa rānei (kia kaua e iti iho i te 60% te nui o te waipiro). Tukuna kia tūpoki te uwhi mata i tō ihu me tō waha, ka whakakikīngia ai mā ngā here rānei, mā ngā koropewa ā-taringa rānei. Ko te uwhi mata me: tūpoki katoa i tō ihu, i tō waha me tō kauwae hāneanea te mautanga, engari me piri hoki ki ngā taha o tō kanohi tuku kia māmā noa iho tō hā tūpoki katoa i tō ihu, i tō waha me tō kauwae hāneanea te mautanga, engari me piri hoki ki ngā taha o tō kanohi tuku kia māmā noa iho tō hā Horoia anō ō ringaringa. Whakamahia ko te: hopi me te wai rānei patuero ā-ringa rānei (kia kaua e iti iho i te 60% te nui o te waipiro). hopi me te wai rānei patuero ā-ringa rānei (kia kaua e iti iho i te 60% te nui o te waipiro). Parea te pānga ki te wāhanga o mua o tō uwhi mata, ki tō kanohi tonu rānei Parea te nekehanga o tō uwhi mata, tae atu ki te kumetanga ki raro iho i tō kauwae Whakakapia ki uwhi mata kē mehemea kua haukū, kua taretare, kua paruparu rānei. Horoia, whakamaroketia hoki ō ringaringa. Whakamahia ko te: hopi me te wai rānei patuero ā-ringa rānei (kia kaua e iti iho i te 60% te nui o te waipiro). hopi me te wai rānei patuero ā-ringa rānei (kia kaua e iti iho i te 60% te nui o te waipiro). Tangohia tō uwhi mata. Tangohia mai i muri, ka kumea atu ai i tō kanohi. Whakamahia ngā koropewa rānei, wetekina rānei ngā here. Kaua e pā ki te wāhanga o mua o te uwhi mata, ki ō karu, ki tō ihu, ki tō waha hoki. Horoia rānei, rukea atu rānei tō uwhi mata. Horoia ngā uwhi mata kua hangā i te papanga mā te pūrere horoi kākahu me te hopi kia 60 tohurau te wera o te wai. Āta whakamaroketia i mua i te whakamahinga anō. Kaua e whakamahia tētahi uwhi mata e haukū ana. Rukea atu ngā uwhi mata e rangitahi nei te whakamahia. Raua atu ki tētahi ipu para e whai taupoki ana, ki tētahi pēke whai piringa rānei, ka whiua atu ai. Kaua e whakamahia anō, e whai rānei ki te patu i ngā huaketo o ngā uwhi mata e rangitahi nei te whakamahia. Horoia ngā uwhi mata kua hangā i te papanga mā te pūrere horoi kākahu me te hopi kia 60 tohurau te wera o te wai. Āta whakamaroketia i mua i te whakamahinga anō. Kaua e whakamahia tētahi uwhi mata e haukū ana. Rukea atu ngā uwhi mata e rangitahi nei te whakamahia. Raua atu ki tētahi ipu para e whai taupoki ana, ki tētahi pēke whai piringa rānei, ka whiua atu ai. Kaua e whakamahia anō, e whai rānei ki te patu i ngā huaketo o ngā uwhi mata e rangitahi nei te whakamahia. Horoia anō ō ringaringa mā te whakamahi i te: hopi me te wai rānei patuero ā-ringa rānei (kia kaua e iti iho i te 60% te nui o te waipiro). hopi me te wai rānei patuero ā-ringa rānei (kia kaua e iti iho i te 60% te nui o te waipiro). --- Section Separator --- Information for Māori Support and information for Pacific Peoples Support and information for disabled people Support your community Alternate formats Translations አማርኛ | Amharic عربي | Arabic Bislama 简体中文 | Chinese (Simplified) 繁體中文 | Chinese (Traditional) Te Reo Māori Kuki ‘Āirani | Cook Islands Māori Español | Spanish دری | Dari فارسی | Farsi Vosa Vakaviti | Fijian ગુજરાતી | Gujarati हिन्दी / Hindi 日本語 | Japanese ကညီ | Karen Te taetae ni Kiribati | Kiribati 한국어 | Korean Bahasa Malaysia | Malay Vagahau Niue | Niuean پښتو | Pashto ਪੰਜਾਬੀ / Punjabi Rohingya Fäeag Rotuḁm | Rotuman Gagana Samoa | Samoan Solomon Aelan Pijin | Solomon Islands Pijin Af-Soomaali | Somali Kiswahili | Swahili Tagalog தமிழ் | Tamil Te reo Māori ภาษาไทย | Thai ትግርኛ | Tigrinya Tok Pisin Te Gagana Tokelau | Tokelauan Lea Faka Tonga | Tongan Te Gana Tuvalu | Tuvaluan اُردُو | Urdu Tiếng Việt | Vietnamese አማርኛ | Amharic عربي | Arabic Bislama 简体中文 | Chinese (Simplified) 繁體中文 | Chinese (Traditional) Te Reo Māori Kuki ‘Āirani | Cook Islands Māori Español | Spanish دری | Dari فارسی | Farsi Vosa Vakaviti | Fijian ગુજરાતી | Gujarati हिन्दी / Hindi 日本語 | Japanese ကညီ | Karen Te taetae ni Kiribati | Kiribati 한국어 | Korean Bahasa Malaysia | Malay Vagahau Niue | Niuean پښتو | Pashto ਪੰਜਾਬੀ / Punjabi Rohingya Fäeag Rotuḁm | Rotuman Gagana Samoa | Samoan Solomon Aelan Pijin | Solomon Islands Pijin Af-Soomaali | Somali Kiswahili | Swahili Tagalog தமிழ் | Tamil Te reo Māori ภาษาไทย | Thai ትግርኛ | Tigrinya Tok Pisin Te Gagana Tokelau | Tokelauan Lea Faka Tonga | Tongan Te Gana Tuvalu | Tuvaluan اُردُو | Urdu Tiếng Việt | Vietnamese
Home Iwi and communities Translations Te reo Māori Te tiaki i tō hapori | Protecting your community Ki te pāngia koe e te mate korona | If you test positive to COVID-19 --- Section Separator --- He nui pea ngā māharahara me ngā pātai ka toko ake mēnā ka pāngia koe e te mate korona. Ka waea atu te kaimahi hauora ki te kōrerorero i ngā take mōu, tae atu ki tōu whānau. Kei konei rātou ki te tautoko me te awhi anō. Ka kōrerohia e rātou ko wai mā te hunga i pāpāngia e koe i ngā rā tata kua mahue ake nei. Ka kōrerohia te whakaneke i a koe – me tōu whānau, mēnā ko te hiahia – ki tētahi puni whakamohoao (external link) e noho āhuru ai koe, hei tāmi hoki i te autaia mate. Ka noho koutou ki te puni kotahi, engari mēnā e māuiui ana koe, ākene ka rerekē tō rūma ki ērā o te whānau e noho ora ana. Mēnā kē ko te hiahia a te whānau he noho ki te kāinga ki te noho rāhui, he pai tonu tēnā. Ko te matū ko te noho āhuru a te katoa. He koreutu ngā ratonga whakamohoao, tae atu ki ngā ō kai, ki ngā ō timotimo, te Waiwhai, te horoi kākahu me ngā paramanawa. Ki te māuiui koe, mā te kapa hauora koe e manaaki. Me rapu, me whakapā e ngā kaimahi hauora nga tāngata katoa i pāpāngia e koe, nā reira, ka waea ana rātou ki a koe, kua uia koe ki ōu takahanga katoa i ngā rangi tata nei. Ka whakamahia ēnei pārongo ki te tautohu i te tangata, i te wāhi rānei i pāngia ai koe e te mate korona, me te whakapāpā haere ki ngā tāngata kua pāngia e koe. Ki te tere kitea ōu hoapā, ko te painga atu tērā ki te pēhi i te autaia mate korona. Nuku atu i te tahi haora te roa o te uiui, engari ka taea tētahi wāhanga i runga waea hei whakapoto i te wā ki te māuiui koe. Ka taea anō e koe te tono tētahi kaiwhakamārama reo hei whakamāori i ō kōrero. Ka meatia koe kia kamakama te neke ki te puni whakamohoao, e āhuru ai tō noho. Ka āhei hoki te whānau ki te noho tahi ki te puni whakamohoao. Heoi ngā mea māuiui, me noho ki rūmā kē hei wawao i te whānau kāore i te māuiui. Mā tōu whānau anō te whakatau ki te whakamohoao ki te kāinga rānei. Ka kōrero tō kaimahi hauora ki a koe me te tautoko atu i ngā whakaritenga katoa e tae pai ai koe ki te puni. Mēnā he kararehe āu, ka whai wā tonu koe ki te whiriwhiri i ngā manaakitanga mōna. Ki te hia haere koe ki te hōhipera, mā ngā kaimahi o reira e āta mahi kia mahi taratahi e tatū ai ngā manaakitanga hauora mōu. Kāore koe e mate ki te utu i ngā utu hauora e pā ana ki te mate korona. Ka āta mātakihia e ngā kaimahi tō hauora me tō toiora i a koe i te puni whakamohoao. He tino whai ture ngā tikanga akuaku me te noho haumaru. Ka whakamōhio atu te kapa hauora i a koe inā ka mōhio pū rātou kua maunu te mate i a koe. Mēnā e āhua māuiui ana koe, engari kāore he take o te haere ki te hōhipera, 10 rangi te roa me noho whakamohoao koe mai i te wā i tīmata ai te mate. Me wātea koe i ngā māuiui katoa mō te 72 haora i mua i te tukutanga ōu ki te kāinga. Ko ēra e tino māuiui ana, ā, kei rō hōhipera, me roa ake te wā i mua i te tukutanga atu ki te kāinga. Kei ia kēhi āna āhuatanga ake. --- Section Separator --- He nui pea ngā māharahara me ngā pātai ka toko ake mēnā ka pāngia koe e te mate korona.
