Home Iwi and communities Translations Te reo Māori Te tiaki i tō hapori | Protecting your community Te whakamātautau | Testing --- Section Separator --- Mehemea kua pāngia koe e ngā tohumate o te maremare, o te mate rānei e pēnei ana i te rewharewha, e noho ki te kāinga, ka waea-utukore ai ki Healthline mā te 0800 358 5453, ki tō whare hauora ā-iwi rānei, ki tō tākuta rānei ki te tuku pātai e pā ana ki te whakamātautau. Kāore he utu o te whakamātautau. E mau ai te wheori i waenga i ō tātou hapori, me whakamātautau rawa te tangata kua pāngia e ngā tohumate o te KOWHEORI-19. Kāore he utu o te whakamātautanga, o te tapuhitanga rānei e pā ana ki te KOWHEORI-19, ka mutu e wātea ana ki te katoa o ngā tāngata o Aotearoa, tae atu ki ērā kāore nei ō rātou kōkota whaimana ā-ture. Tēnā, hoatu ō taipitopito whakapānga ki te hunga e whakahaere ana i te whakamātautau kia whakapā ai rātou ki a koe e pā ana ki ngā hua o te whakamātautau. Ehara i te mea me whai nama Tautuhi Hauora ā-Motu ( NHI ) koe, me whakaatu rānei tō tohu tautuhi e whakamātauhia ai koe. He rite tonu te panonihia o ngā wāhi e whakamātauria ai koe. Ko te wāhi pai katoa e kitea ai tētahi rārangi o te wā, ko tō Poari Hauora ā-Rohe e pātata ana, ko ngā Whare Hauora Tūmatanui rānei e pātata ana. Kei raro iho nei ētahi o aua pārongo: Te Tai Tokerau (external link) Tāmaki-makaurau (external link) Waikato (external link) Waiariki, Rotorua me Taupō (external link) Upoko ki te Uru Hauora (external link) Te Awakairangi (external link) Te Wairarapa (external link) Te Matau a Māui (external link) Whakatāne (external link) Te Pae Hauora o Tararua, o Ruahine (Ōtaki, Taitoko, Papaioea, Kawakawa, Tāmaki-nui-a-Rua) (external link) Te Tairāwhiti (Tūranga) (external link) Taranaki (external link) Waitematā (external link) Whanganui (external link) Waitaha (external link) Te Waiora (external link) Waitaha ki te Tonga (external link) Te Tonga (external link) Te Poari Hauora ā-Rohe o Tai Poutini (external link) Mehemea me whakamātautau koe e pā ana ki te KOWHEORI-19, he tīpakotanga nō tō tinana ka tangohia. Ko te huarahi e auau katoa ana te whāia, ko te muku i te pakohu o tō ihu. He rite te rāmuku ki te matahune, engari he roa ake te rākau. Ka tukuna te tīpakotanga ki tētahi taiwhanga pūtaiao kia tātarihia. Ka pau pea tētahi wā roa tonu, kātahi ngā hua mai i te taiwhanga pūtaiao ka puta. Ina whakamātauria koe, ka kīia atu ki a koe te wā me te āhua e tau ai ki a koe ngā hua mōu. Mehemea kei Tāmaki-makaurau tō kāinga, me mātua noho koe ki te kāinga noho taratahi ai, tae noa ki te wā ka tau ki a koe ngā hua mōu. Ehara i te mea me noho taratahi te nuinga o ngā tāngata kei waho o Tāmaki-makaurau e noho ana i te wā e tāria ana te hua o te whakamātautau — mā tō tākuta koe hei tohutohu e pā ana ki tēnei take. Ka mātua tonoa koe kia noho taratahi mehemea: kua hoki mai koe i tāwāhi i nā tata nei kua pā atu koe ki tētahi kua hoki mai i tāwāhi i nā tata nei he whakapānga tata koe nō tētahi kua pāngia e te KOWHEORI-19. Mehemea ka whakamātauhia koe, tēnā, whāia ngā tohutohu ki a koe e pā ana ki ngā mahi ka whai ake. Tērā pea, ka āwangawanga koe, ka nui rānei ō pātai mehemea ka tau ki a koe tētahi hua whakamātautau e tohu ana i te pāngia ōu e te KOWHEORI-19. Ka waeahia koe e tētahi kaimahi hauora ki te kōrero mō ngā pānga o tēnei take ki a koutou ko tō whānau. Kei reira taua kaimahi hei tautoko, hei āwhina hoki i a koe. Ka kōrero ia ki a koe e pā ana ki te katoa kua whakapāngia e koe i nā tata nei. Ka kōrero hoki ia ki a koe e pā ana ki te nuku i a koe — i a koutou rānei ko tō whānau, ki te hiahia koe kia pērā - ki tētahi wāhi whakataratahi (external link) kia eke ai te tapuhitanga o koutou katoa ki te taumata tiketike katoa ka taea, ā, kia kaua ai hoki te wheori e hōrapa. Ka noho koutou katoa ki tētahi wāhi kotahi, engari ki te māuiui koe ka noho pea koe ki tētahi rūma kē atu i ō tō whānau kāore nei i te māuiui. Ki te hiahia tō whānau ki te noho taratahi ki te kāinga, tēnā i te haere ki te wāhi whakataratahi, e pai ana tēnā. Ko te whāinga hoki, kia eke te haumarutanga o te katoa ki tōna taumata tiketike katoa ka taea. Kāore he utu o ngā ratonga whakataratahi katoa, pēnei i ngā kai, i ngā timotimo kai, i te ipurangi here-kore, i te horoi kaka, i ngā taputapu horoi tinana me mātua whai me ngā inu. Mehemea ka māuiui koe, mā tētahi rōpū hauora kua āta tohua koe hei tapuhi. Mehemea ka pāngia te tamaiti, tōna whānau rānei e tiaki ana i a ia e te KOWHEORI-19, ā, me mātua whakataratahi, ka āta whakaū mātou i te haumaru o te noho a te tamaiti ki ngā ringa manaaki o tōna whānau. Ka āhei tō wehenga atu ā tōna wā e piki ai te ora ki a koe. --- Section Separator --- Mehemea kua pāngia koe e ngā tohumate o te maremare, o te mate rānei e pēnei ana i te rewharewha, e noho ki te kāinga, ka waea-utukore ai ki Healthline mā te 0800 358 5453, ki tō whare hauora ā-iwi rānei, ki tō tākuta rānei ki te tuku pātai e pā ana ki te whakamātautau. Kāore he utu o te whakamātautau. E mau ai te wheori i waenga i ō tātou hapori, me whakamātautau rawa te tangata kua pāngia e ngā tohumate o te KOWHEORI-19. Kāore he utu o te whakamātautanga, o te tapuhitanga rānei e pā ana ki te KOWHEORI-19, ka mutu e wātea ana ki te katoa o ngā tāngata o Aotearoa, tae atu ki ērā kāore nei ō rātou kōkota whaimana ā-ture. Tēnā, hoatu ō taipitopito whakapānga ki te hunga e whakahaere ana i te whakamātautau kia whakapā ai rātou ki a koe e pā ana ki ngā hua o te whakamātautau. Ehara i te mea me whai nama Tautuhi Hauora ā-Motu ( NHI ) koe, me whakaatu rānei tō tohu tautuhi e whakamātauhia ai koe. He rite tonu te panonihia o ngā wāhi e whakamātauria ai koe. Ko te wāhi pai katoa e kitea ai tētahi rārangi o te wā, ko tō Poari Hauora ā-Rohe e pātata ana, ko ngā Whare Hauora Tūmatanui rānei e pātata ana. Kei raro iho nei ētahi o aua pārongo: Te Tai Tokerau (external link) Tāmaki-makaurau (external link) Waikato (external link) Waiariki, Rotorua me Taupō (external link) Upoko ki te Uru Hauora (external link) Te Awakairangi (external link) Te Wairarapa (external link) Te Matau a Māui (external link) Whakatāne (external link) Te Pae Hauora o Tararua, o Ruahine (Ōtaki, Taitoko, Papaioea, Kawakawa, Tāmaki-nui-a-Rua) (external link) Te Tairāwhiti (Tūranga) (external link) Taranaki (external link) Waitematā (external link) Whanganui (external link) Waitaha (external link) Te Waiora (external link) Waitaha ki te Tonga (external link) Te Tonga (external link) Te Poari Hauora ā-Rohe o Tai Poutini (external link) Mehemea me whakamātautau koe e pā ana ki te KOWHEORI-19, he tīpakotanga nō tō tinana ka tangohia. Home Iwi and communities Translations Te reo Māori Ngā Pāe Mataara | The Alert Levels Te noho i te pae 1 | Living at Level 1 --- Section Separator --- Kei waho tonu rā a KOWHEORI-19. Ko ngā tāngata katoa o Aotearoa me mātua whai: Kia rite tonu te horoi i ngā ringa ki te hopi ka whakamaroke ai, kia whakamahia rānei te patuero ā-ringa. Kia mare, kia matihe rānei ki tō tuke. Mēnā e pāngia ana koe e ngā tohumate o te maremare, o te rewharewha rānei, kia noho ki te kāinga, me waea ki tō tākuta, ki tō kaituku ratonga hauora ā-iwi, ki Healthline rānei, ka pātai ai mēnā e tika ana kia whakamātauria koe. Kaua e hāereere, kaua e haere ki te kura, kaua hoki e haere ki te mahi. Kia mau he kōrero mō ngā wāhi e haere rā koe me te hunga e torona rā e koe. Whakamahia rānei te taupānga o NZ COVID Tracer , tētahi puka-iti rānei e pā ana ki te whakatewhatewha pānga mō KOWHEORI-19, ngā tuhinga ā-ringa rānei. He tohutohu mō te haere kia whakamātauria He tohutohu mō te huaketo me ōna tohumate I runga ki nga waka tūmatanui, ai ka ū nga arai mata Mā te ū tonu ki ngā tikanga pai o te uwhi mata e āwhina kia haumaru tonu koe me ētahi atu, ka mutu mā te pērā hoki e kaha kē atu ai te haumarutia ōu i ngā wā e iti ana rānei, e kore ana rānei te tū tīrara a ngā tāngata, hei tauira, i ngā waka tūmatanui, i ngā hokomaha hoki. He tohutohu mō te uwhi mata Kāore he herenga i runga i ngā huihuinga. Ka whai wāhi atu ki ēnei ngā tangihanga, ngā mārena, ngā huihuinga ā-hāhi me ngā huihuinga ā-hapori, ngā tākaro me ngā mahi a te rēhia. I te Pae Mataara 1, kua herea a KOWHEORI-19 engari ka whai hua tonu te ū kia tū tīrara i te hunga kāore e mōhiotia ana e koe ka puta ana koe ki hea rānei. Mā te pērā e tautāwhi te rerenga o KOWHEORI-19 mehemea ka rere anō te mate i waenga i te hapori. E āhei ana te rere noa o ngā whakahaere a ngā pakihi me ngā wāhi mahi. Me mātua whakaatu tonu rātou i te tohu QR o te NZ COVID Tracer , ā, me mātua whai hoki i pūnaha kē hei whakatewhatewha pāngaā ki ia papa. Me whakaatu tonu ngā waka tūmatanui i ngā tohu QR mō te whakatewhatewha pānga. E āhei ana kia tuwhera noa ngā kura, ngā ratonga ako kōhungahunga me ngā kura tuatoru. Ka haumaru te noho a te tamariki ki te kura. He wā ōna ka āta whakaputaina he pūrongo hei whāngai rānei i te tangata ki te kōrero teka, hei tāware rānei i a rātou. E taupatupatu ana tērā ki a tātou i tēnei wā me mātua mahi ngātahi tātou hei turaki i te huaketo. He tohutohu e mau ai ngā pūrongo e tika ana Kāore anō a KOWHEORI-19 kia herea i tāwāhi. Kei te mau tonu ngā whakaritenga i ō tātou tawhā hei tautāwhi i te tūpono ka rere mai a KOWHEORI-19 i tāwāhi. Me mātua haere te hunga e tau mai ana ki Aotearoa ki ngā wāhi whakataratahi, atu i ngā wā kua kore e mate ki te pērā (ahakoa pēhea, me noho taratahi tonu). Ko ngā kaimahi kei ngā wāhi whakataratahi, kei ngā wāhi taratahi, kei ngā tūranga mahi hoki e nui ake nei te tūpono ka pāngia e te mate, he rite tonu te whakamātauria mō KOWHEORI-19. --- Section Separator --- Kei waho tonu rā a KOWHEORI-19. Home Iwi and communities Translations Te reo Māori Ngā Pāe Mataara | The Alert Levels Te noho i te pae 2 | Living at Level 2 --- Section Separator --- Mehemea kua pāngia koe e ngā tohumate o te maremare, te rewharewha, te KOWHEORI-19 rānei, e noho ki te kāinga, ka waea-utukore ai ki Healthline mā te 0800 358 5453 , ki tō tākuta rānei ki te tuku pātai e pā ana ki te whakamātautau. Kia mahara ake,kāore he utu o te whakamātautau. Mēnā he ohotata tōu, kia wawe tonu te waea atu ki 111 . I te Pae Mataara 2 me: 2 mita te tawhiti atu i ētahi atu mēnā kei waho i te kāinga, 1 mita rānei i ngā wāhi mahi. Mau ārai kanohi mēnā : he pakeke ake koe i te 12 tau, i ngā wāhi rō whare tūmatanui pēnei i ngā whare pukapuka, whare taonga me ngā mōro . he kaimahi koe e anga atu ana ki te kiritaki i ētahi whare manaaki, whare tūmatanui rānei. he uaua te tū tīrara (ehara i te ture engari e tino whakahaua ana) . he pakeke ake koe i te 12 tau, i ngā wāhi rō whare tūmatanui pēnei i ngā whare pukapuka, whare taonga me ngā mōro . he kaimahi koe e anga atu ana ki te kiritaki i ētahi whare manaaki, whare tūmatanui rānei. he uaua te tū tīrara (ehara i te ture engari e tino whakahaua ana) . Whai haere i ngā wāhi kua tae koe, ngā tāngata kua kite koe hoki. Whakamahi i te taupānga NZ COVID Tracer, te puka NZ COVID tracer, ngā tuhipoka rānei. Noho kāinga mēnā e māuiui ana. Kaua e haere ki te mahi, te kura rānei. Kaua e whakawhanaunga. Waea atu ki a Healthline ki te whakarite whakamātautau mēnā e whakaatu ana koe i ngā tohumate o te KOWHEORI-19. Ina whiwhi koe i te whakamātautau KOWHEORI-19, me noho mohoao i te kāinga, kia puta rā anō ngā hua. Wawe te noho mohoao mēnā koirā te whakahau. Auau te horoi, te whakamaroke hoki i ō ringa. Rapu kōrero atu anō mō: Ngā whakamātautau Ngā wāhi whaipānga Whaiwhai i te pātanga Te huaketo KOWHEORI-19 me ngā tohumate I ngā huihuinga, taiopenga me ngā whare taiopenga, ka taea te mōrahi o te: 100 tāngata i rō whare kua tautohua, ā, 100 tāngata i ngā wāhi kua tautohua kei waho. Ka pā ēnei herenga ki ngā taiopenga katoa pēnei i te mārena, tangihanga, ngā whakarite, hākinakina hapori me ngā mahi kori, hui ā-whānau me ngā hui tūmataiti. Ko te wāhi tautohu he wāhi kotahi, i rō whare, i waho rānei, e wehea mai ana i ētahi atu wāhi. Mēnā neke atu i te kotahi wāhi tautohu, kua kore e taea e te tangata te whakawhitiwhiti wāhi. Ka uru ki tēnei te tomo, te wehe, te haere rānei ki te wharepaku. Kāore ngā kaimahi e whakarato ratonga ana i te taiopenga e uru ki ngā tepenga huihuinga rō whare, i waho rānei. Mēnā he tāngata ōu kei ngā wāhi rō whare, waho hoki, me mātua whakarite kia kaua ngā rōpū e rua e pāhekoheko. Ko te tikanga o tēnei, me noho wehe ngā tomokanga ki ngā wāhi tiri - hei tauira, ngā wharepkau, ngā taupaepae rānei e haere atu ai te tangata ki te tono, te utu rānei. Rapua ētahi atu kōrero mō ngā huihuinga i te Pae Mataara 2 Mēnā e māuiui ana koe, me noho i te kāinga. Mēnā e ora ana, ka taea e koe te hāereere i te Pae Mataara 2, tae atu ki ētahi atu rohe kei te Pae Mataara 2. Me whakarite koe kia haumaru tō mahi i taua mahi. Kāore rawa e whakaaetia ana te whakawhiti i te paewhenua Pae Mataara mō ngā haerenga whaiaro. Hei āwhina tēnei ki te aukati i te horahanga o te huaketo. Ka taea anake te whakawhiti i te paewhenua Pae Mataara mēnā e whakaaetia ana tērā haerenga. E whakaaetia ana ētahi haere pakihi. E whakaaetia ana ētahi haerenga whaiaro, hei tauira, mō ngā take hauora, ngā ohotata, te tuku manaaki, tautoko rānei ki tētahi atu e noho whāomoomo ana e whai mate tuamatanga ana rānei, e tiri ana i te tiakanga tamariki rānei. Mēnā e whakawhiti ana i te ripa mō ngā take kua whakaaetia, me kawe koe i te taunakitanga tika. Mēnā kāore e whakaaetia ana tō take whakawhiti ripa, ka taea e koe te tono whakawāteatanga. Me tutuki i tō tono ētahi paearu e hāngai ana. Rapua he kōrero anō mō te hāereere, te nekehanga me ngā whakawāteatanga I te Pae Mataara 2, ka taea ō hākinakina, mahi kori auau hoki, mēnā he haumaru te mahi. Engari mēnā e māuiui ana koe, me noho i te kāinga. Ka taea e koe ngā mahi pēnei i te: hīkoi, eke pahikara me te whakangau i runga whenua rāhui tūmatanui kaukau i tētahi puna kaukau tūmatanui, engari tērā ngā here haere ki te whare kori, engari tērā ngā here haere i runga poti, ngā hākinakina i runga i te wai Me tutuki hoki i te hākinakina me ngā mahi rēhia ngā aratohu mō ngā huihuinga me te pupuri rekoata. He uaua te mahi kori me ngā hākinakina i te wā e mau ārai kanohi ana, nō reira kāore te ture ārai kanohi e whai pānga ki ngā mahi kori. I ngā taiao whare kori, me 2 mita te tawhiti i ētahi atu, ko te tikanga o tērā ka iti noa iho pea te hunga e āhei ana ki ngā wāhi kori kei rō whare. I te wā e kori tinana ana i ngā wāhi tūmatanui, kia 2 mita te tawhiti i ētahi atu tāngata kāore koe i te mōhio i ngā wā e taea ana. Me mau ārai kanohi i ētahi tū wāhi, tae atu ki ngā waka tūmatanui, te toro i ngā whare hauora, i ngā hokomaha me ētahi atu wāhi tūmatanui. E akiaki ana hoki mātou i a koe ki te mau ārai kanohi, me te noho kia 2m te tawhiti i ētahi atu i tō wehenga i te kāinga. Inarā mēnā he uaua ki te noho tawhiti i ētahi atu. Hei tauira, i te kohinga o ngā ō rangaranga. Rapua ngā wā me mau ārai waha koe Mēnā raru ana koe ki te taha pūtea, kai, tō oranga hinengaro, tinana rānei, tērā pea he tautoko e wātea ana. Pāwhiri ki konei mō ētahi mōhiohio mō ngā tautoko mā te tangata kotahi Pāwhiri ki konei mō ētahi mōhiohio mō ngā tautoko mā ngā pakihi E tūwhera ana ngā whare ako kōhungahunga katoa, me ngā kura ki ngā reanga katoa. He haumaru tonu te haere a ngā tamariki ki te kura. Me noho ngā tamariki me ngā taiohi ki te kāinga mēnā: e māuiui ana he tohumate KOWHEORI-19 ō rātou e noho mohoao ana e tatari ana ki ngā hua o tētahi whakamātautau KOWHEORI-19. E tino whakahaua ana kia mau ārai kanohi te hunga pakeke ake i te 12 tau i te kura. Ka taea e ngā wāhi pakihi te noho tuwhera ki ngā kaimahi me ngā kiritaki mēnā e tutuki ana ngā here hauora tūmatanui katoa. Ko ngā here hauora tūmatanui ko te: whakaatu i tētahi pānui waehere QR taupānga NZ COVID Tracer, me te whai i ētahi atu pūnaha whaiwhai pātanga rerekē; ā, me te whai i ngā tikanga akuaku pēnei i te horoi ringa me te horoi auau i ngā mata, ā, me te whai i ngā aratohu tū tirara. Ka taea tonu e ngā ratonga ka whakaratoa i ngā wāhi kiritaki (pēnei i ō rātou kāinga ake), me ngā ratonga pānga tata (hei tauira, ngā kaihaumanu rerehua me ngā kaikuti makawe) te whakahaere mēnā ka tutuki i a rātou ngā tikanga hauora tūmatanui. Me mau ārai kanohi katoa te hunga e mahi ana i tētahi ratonga pānga tata. Ki te kore e taea e te wāhi mahi te whakatutuki i ēnei tikanga, e kore e taea e ia te whakahaere. E whakahaua ana ngā pakihi katoa ki te whakamahi i ētahi atu huarahi mahi mēnā ka taea, ā, me kōrero ki ngā kaimahi ki te tautuhi i ngā mōrearea, ā, me pēhea te whakahaere. Me tutuki hoki i ngā pakihi te katoa o ngā here hauora me te haumaru, te tiaki i ngā kaimahi, ā, me te whakatutuki i ngā paerewa tuku mahi mōkito rawa. E ai ki te ture, me whai tukanga ngā pakihi me ngā kaiwhakarite taiopenga e taea ai te rekoata i tō toronga. Me whai huarahi nui atu i te kotahi mō te pūrongo i te toronga o te tangata, inarā mō te hunga kāore e taea e rātou te matawai i ngā waehere QR. Ka uru ki tēnei ngā whare kawhe, ngā whare kai, ngā wāhi inu waipiro, ngā whare petipeti, ngā kōnehete, ngā whare kaumātua, ngā whare hauora (hāunga ngā tūroro), ngā kaikuti makawe, ngā whare kori, whare kanikani, whare pukapuka, kōti, tari kaunihera, kāwanatanga hoki, me ngā kaituku ratonga pāpori e whai wāhi taupaepae ana. Koinei ētahi momo rekoata i tō toronga: te pātai i te tangata kia matawai mā te taupānga NZ COVID Tracer te rekoata ā-ringa i ngā taipitopito a ō kiritaki, manuhiri hoki. te whakarato puka tuhi hei whakakī mā ngā kiritaki me ngā manuhiri ki ō rātou taipitopito, ā, ka rau ki tētahi pouaka kohi te whakamahi i ō pūnaha puri rekoata, pēnei i te āheinga kāri miri, te whakarite tāpui rānei. Me haere tonu te mahi a ngā pakihi ki te whakaatu i te tohu waehere QR, ahakoa kāore e hiahiatia ana ki te kohi i ngā rekoata kiritaki. He mōhiohio whaiaro ngā rekaota whakapā. Me haumaru te kohi, te whakamahi, te puri, te whāki, ā, me te porowhiu i runga anō i ngā tikanga o te Privacy Act 2020. He nui ake pea ngā hiahia haumaru o ngā pūnaha rekoata rerekē. Pāwhiri ki konei mō ngā mōhiohio e pā ana ki te puri rekoata me te whaiwhai i te pātanga mā ngā pakihi Ka mahi tonu ngā ratonga ohotata i ngā Pae Mataara katoa Ina pā he ohotata, whāia ngā aratohu ohotata whānui, tohutohu rānei mai i ngā mana ohotata. Ko tō haumarutanga te mea nui. Kia haumaru koe, whāia ngā whakatūpato ki te ārai i te horanga o te KOWHEORI-19, pēnei i te tū tīrara, te mau ārai kanohi rānei. Mēnā he mōreareatanga ki tō oranga, kāinga rānei, me waea ki 111 ka tono i te Pirihimana, Whakaratonga Iwi, Waka Tūroro rānei. Rapu me aha koe i te wā o te ohotata --- Section Separator --- Mehemea kua pāngia koe e ngā tohumate o te maremare, te rewharewha, te KOWHEORI-19 rānei, e noho ki te kāinga, ka waea-utukore ai ki Healthline mā te 0800 358 5453 , ki tō tākuta rānei ki te tuku pātai e pā ana ki te whakamātautau. Kia mahara ake,kāore he utu o te whakamātautau. Mēnā he ohotata tōu, kia wawe tonu te waea atu ki 111 . --- Section Separator --- I te Pae Mataara 2 me: 2 mita te tawhiti atu i ētahi atu mēnā kei waho i te kāinga, 1 mita rānei i ngā wāhi mahi. Rapu me aha koe i te wā o te ohotata --- Section Separator --- Information for Māori Support and information for Pacific Peoples Support and information for disabled people Support your community Alternate formats Translations አማርኛ | Amharic عربي | Arabic Bislama 简体中文 | Chinese (Simplified) 繁體中文 | Chinese (Traditional) Te Reo Māori Kuki ‘Āirani | Cook Islands Māori Español | Spanish دری | Dari فارسی | Farsi Vosa Vakaviti | Fijian ગુજરાતી | Gujarati हिन्दी / Hindi 日本語 | Japanese ကညီ | Karen Te taetae ni Kiribati | Kiribati 한국어 | Korean Bahasa Malaysia | Malay Vagahau Niue | Niuean پښتو | Pashto ਪੰਜਾਬੀ / Punjabi Rohingya Fäeag Rotuḁm | Rotuman Gagana Samoa | Samoan Solomon Aelan Pijin | Solomon Islands Pijin Af-Soomaali | Somali Kiswahili | Swahili Tagalog தமிழ் | Tamil Te reo Māori ภาษาไทย | Thai ትግርኛ | Tigrinya Tok Pisin Te Gagana Tokelau | Tokelauan Lea Faka Tonga | Tongan Te Gana Tuvalu | Tuvaluan اُردُو | Urdu Tiếng Việt | Vietnamese አማርኛ | Amharic عربي | Arabic Bislama 简体中文 | Chinese (Simplified) 繁體中文 | Chinese (Traditional) Te Reo Māori Kuki ‘Āirani | Cook Islands Māori Español | Spanish دری | Dari فارسی | Farsi Vosa Vakaviti | Fijian ગુજરાતી | Gujarati हिन्दी / Hindi 日本語 | Japanese ကညီ | Karen Te taetae ni Kiribati | Kiribati 한국어 | Korean Bahasa Malaysia | Malay Vagahau Niue | Niuean پښتو | Pashto ਪੰਜਾਬੀ / Punjabi Rohingya Fäeag Rotuḁm | Rotuman Gagana Samoa | Samoan Solomon Aelan Pijin | Solomon Islands Pijin Af-Soomaali | Somali Kiswahili | Swahili Tagalog தமிழ் | Tamil Te reo Māori ภาษาไทย | Thai ትግርኛ | Tigrinya Tok Pisin Te Gagana Tokelau | Tokelauan Lea Faka Tonga | Tongan Te Gana Tuvalu | Tuvaluan اُردُو | Urdu Tiếng Việt | Vietnamese
Home Iwi and communities Translations Te reo Māori Ngā Pāe Mataara | The Alert Levels Te noho i te pae 3 | Living at Level 3 --- Section Separator --- 12 o Whiringa-ā-nuku 2021 Kei te Pae Mataara 3 tonu a Tāmaki Makaurau, ahakoa kua whakamāmātia ētahi o ngā here. Ināianei ka taea e koe: he huihuinga pāpori i waho me ngā whare e rua, atu ki te 10 tāngata. te hāereere puta noa i te rohe o Tāmaki Makaurau ki te mahi i ētahi atu mahi pēnei i te hahau pōro, te whakangau, te whakatere waka, te hī ika, te ruku, wakareti wai, me te rere ā-ngahau. I te mōrahi o ngā whare e rua, tokorua anake ngā tāngata e āhei ana ki te hui tahi. te haere ki ngā karaehe kori ā-waho (pēnei i te yoga) me te mōrahi o te 10 tāngata (e pai ana mēnā nō ngā whare rerekē), ka uru hoki te kaiako. Me mau tonu i te 2 mita o te tū tīrara. Ka taea e ngā tamariki te hoki ki ngā whare ako kōhungahunga, me te mōrahi o te 10 tamariki i ia kāhui rāhui. Me mau ārai kanohi ngā mātua me ngā kaitiaki i te wāhi kohi, whakataka hoki. Ka rerekē pea ēnei here i runga anō i te āhua o ngā tohutohu hauora tūmatanui. Rapua ngā mōhiohio hou rawa mō ngā tautuhinga Pae Mataara 3 o Tāmaki Makaurau Mehemea kua pāngia koe e ngā tohumate o te maremare, te rewharewha, te KOWHEORI-19 rānei, e noho ki te kāinga, ka waea-utukore ai ki Healthline mā te 0800 358 5453 , ki tō tākuta rānei ki te tuku pātai e pā ana ki te whakamātautau. Kia mahara ake,kāore he utu o te whakamātautau. Mēnā he ohotata tōu, kia wawe tonu te waea atu ki 111 . I te Pae Mataara 3 me: 2 mita te tawhiti atu i ētahi atu mēnā kei waho i te kāinga, 1 mita rānei i ngā wāhi mahi. Mau ārai kanohi mēnā: he pakeke ake koe i te 12 tau, i ngā wāhi rō whare tūmatanui pēnei i ngā whare pukapuka, whare taonga me ngā mōro. he kaimahi koe e anga atu ana ki te kiritaki i ētahi whare manaaki, whare tūmatanui rānei. he uaua te tū tīrara (ehara i te ture engari e tino whakahaua ana). he pakeke ake koe i te 12 tau, i ngā wāhi rō whare tūmatanui pēnei i ngā whare pukapuka, whare taonga me ngā mōro. he kaimahi koe e anga atu ana ki te kiritaki i ētahi whare manaaki, whare tūmatanui rānei. he uaua te tū tīrara (ehara i te ture engari e tino whakahaua ana). Whai haere i ngā wāhi kua tae koe, ngā tāngata kua kite koe hoki. Whakamahi i te taupānga NZ COVID Tracer, te puka NZ COVID tracer, ngā tuhipoka rānei. Noho kāinga mēnā e māuiui ana. Kaua e haere ki te mahi, te kura rānei. Kaua e whakawhanaunga. Waea atu ki a Healthline ki te whakarite whakamātautau mēnā e whakaatu ana koe i ngā tohumate o te KOWHEORI-19. Ina whiwhi koe i te whakamātautau KOWHEORI-19, me noho mohoao i te kāinga, kia puta rā anō ngā hua. Wawe te noho mohoao mēnā koirā te whakahau. Auau te horoi, te whakamaroke hoki i ō ringa. Rapu kōrero atu anō mō: Ngā whakamātautau Ngā wāhi whaipānga Whaiwhai i te pātanga Te huaketo KOWHEORI-19 me ngā tohumate I te Pae Mataara 3, e herea ana koe e te ture ki te noho i tō kāhui rāhui kāinga mēnā kāore koe i te mahi, te kura rānei. Ko tō kāhui rāhui kāinga te rōpū tāngata he whakapānga ā-tinana tāu ki a rātou i ia rā. I te Pae Mataara 3, ka uru hoki te hunga e noho tahi ana i tō kāinga, ā, mēnā e tika ana, ngā whānau tata, te hunga mohoao, kaitiaki rānei. Me noho whāiti tonu tō kāhui rāhui. E kore e taea te pōhiri hoa, whānau rānei kāore i roto i tō kāhui rāhui, kia haere ki tō kāinga. Te tūtaki ki ō hoa me te whānau i te Pae Mataara 3 E whakaaetia ana ngā huihuinga o te 10 tāngata iti ake rānei, heoi anō, mō ngā mārena, ngā nehunga me ngā tangihanga anake. Ā-ture nei me tū tīrara, me whai hoki i ngā tohutohu hauora tūmatanui. Rapua ētahi atu kōrero mō ngā huihuinga i te Pae Mataara 3 He tepenga tō ngā nekehanga whaiaro, pakihi hoki i te Pae Mataara 3, i waenga hoki i ngā rohe Pae Mataara 3 me ētahi atu rohe Pae Mataara. Hei āwhina tēnei ki te aukati i te horahanga o te huaketo. Kua whakaaetia ētahi haerenga pakihi, hei tauira e mahi ana koe mō tētahi pakihi, ratonga rānei kei te Pae Mataara 4. E whakaaetia ana ētahi haerenga whaiaro, hei tauira, mō ngā take hauora, ngā ohotata, te tuku manaaki, tautoko rānei ki tētahi atu e noho whāomoomo ana e whai mate tuamatanga ana rānei, e tiri ana i te tiakanga tamariki rānei. Mēnā e haere ana mō ngā take kua whakaaetia, me kawe koe i te taunakitanga tika. Mēnā kāore e whakaaetia ana tō take haere, ka taea e koe te tono whakawāteatanga. Me tutuki i tō tono ētahi paearu e hāngai ana. Rapua he kōrero anō mō te hāereere, te nekehanga me ngā whakawāteatanga I te Pae Mataara 3, ka taea e koe te kori takitahi i tō rohe tata, i te taha o ētahi atu hunga rānei o tō kāhui rāhui kāinga. Ko te mea nui katoa kia noho haumaru, kia noho tata ki tō kāinga. Haere ki tō paparēhia, ākau tata rānei, kaua ki tō mea kaingākau. Me kuhu ki ngā mahi mōrearea iti, kāore nei e hiahiatia ana ngā ratonga whakaora, hauora rānei. Ngā hākinakina me ngā mahi a rēhia i te Pae Mataara 3 Me mau ārai kanohi i ētahi tū wāhi, tae atu ki ngā waka tūmatanui, te toro i ngā whare hauora, i ngā hokomaha me ētahi atu wāhi tūmatanui. E akiaki ana hoki mātou i a koe ki te mau ārai kanohi, me te noho kia 2m te tawhiti i ētahi atu i tō wehenga i te kāinga. Inarā mēnā he uaua ki te noho tawhiti i ētahi atu. Hei tauira, i te kohinga o ngā ō rangaranga. Rapua ngā wā me mau ārai waha koe Mēnā raru ana koe ki te taha pūtea, kai, tō oranga hinengaro, tinana rānei, tērā pea he tautoko e wātea ana. Pāwhiri ki konei mō ētahi mōhiohio mō ngā tautoko mā te tangata kotahi Pāwhiri ki konei mō ētahi mōhiohio mō ngā tautoko mā ngā pakihi E tuwhera ana ngā whare kōhungahunga, ngā kura me ngā pūtahitanga mātauranga matua mā ngā tamariki i raro i te 14 tau te pakeke, a ngā mātua me ngā kaitiaki ka mate ki te hoki ā-kanohi ki te mahi anake. E pai ana kia hoki ēnei tamariki ki te kura, ā, ka whakaritea ngā kāhui rāhui iti o ngā ākonga me ngā kaiako. Kua katia nga wāhi tūmatanui. Ka uru ki tēnei ngā whare pukapuka, ngā whare taonga, ngā whare pikitia, ngā wāhi kai, ngā whare kori tinana, ngā puna kaukau, ngā paparēhia me ngā mākete. Ehara tēnei i te wā hou ki te kuhu ki ētahi mahi hou, te whakaraerae rānei i a koe, tō kāhui rāhui rānei ki te mōrearea. Ka taea ngā mahi rēhia mōrearea iti i tō rohe paetata. I te Pae Mataara 3, me mahi te katoa mai i te kāinga mēnā ka taea. Mēnā he pānga tata ā-tinana kei roto i ngā mahi a tō pakihi, e kore e whakaaehia kia tuwhera.Ka taea e ērā atu pakihi te mahi, engari tērā ngā here. Arā: ngā here tū tīrara kia nui ake ngā tikanga akuaku te horoi me te paturopi auau i ngā mata tiri te whiwhi i ngā kōwhiringa pānga kore mō te tono, te tiki, te kawe me te utu. te whakarite i te maunga a ngā kaimahi, ngā kiritaki me ngā manuhiri i ngā ārai kanohi mēnā e tika ana. He iti noa ngā pakihi e āhei atu ai ngā kiritaki te toro atu ki ō rātou wāhi mahi, rapua ko ēhea aua pakihi . Me tutuki hoki i ngā pakihi te katoa o ngā here hauora me te haumaru, te tiaki i ngā kaimahi, ā, me te whakatutuki i ngā paerewa tuku mahi mōkito rawa. E ākina ana ngā pakihi ki te kōrero ki ngā kaimahi ki te tautuhi i ngā mōreareatanga me ngā huarahi whakahaere i aua mōreareatanga E ai ki te ture, me whai tukanga ngā pakihi me ngā kaiwhakarite taiopenga e taea ai te rekoata i tō toronga. Me whai huarahi nui atu i te kotahi mō te pūrongo i te toronga o te tangata, inarā mō te hunga kāore e taea e rātou te matawai i ngā waehere QR. Ka uru ki tēnei ngā whare kawhe, ngā whare kai, ngā wāhi inu waipiro, ngā whare petipeti, ngā kōnehete, ngā whare kaumātua, ngā whare hauora (hāunga ngā tūroro), ngā kaikuti makawe, ngā whare kori, whare kanikani, whare pukapuka, kōti, tari kaunihera, kāwanatanga hoki, me ngā kaituku ratonga pāpori e whai wāhi taupaepae ana. Koinei ētahi momo rekoata i tō toronga: te pātai i te tangata kia matawai mā te taupānga NZ COVID Tracer te rekoata ā-ringa i ngā taipitopito a ō kiritaki, manuhiri hoki. te whakarato puka tuhi hei whakakī mā ngā kiritaki me ngā manuhiri ki ō rātou taipitopito, ā, ka rau ki tētahi pouaka kohi mā te whakamahi ō pūnaha puri rekoata, pēnei i te āheinga kāri miri, te whakarite tāpui rānei. Me haere tonu te mahi a ngā pakihi ki te whakaatu i te tohu waehere QR, ahakoa kāore e hiahiatia ana ki te kohi i ngā rekoata kiritaki. He mōhiohio whaiaro ngā rekaota whakapā. Me haumaru te kohi, te whakamahi, te puri, te whāki, ā, me te porowhiu i runga anō i ngā tikanga o te Privacy Act 2020. He nui ake pea ngā hiahia haumaru o ngā pūnaha rekoata rerekē. Pāwhiri ki konei mō ngā mōhiohio e pā ana ki te puri rekoata me te whaiwhai i te pātanga mā ngā pakihi Ka mahi tonu ngā ratonga ohotata i ngā Pae Mataara katoa Ina pā he ohotata, whāia ngā aratohu ohotata whānui, tohutohu rānei mai i ngā mana ohotata. Ko tō haumarutanga te mea nui. Kia haumaru koe, whāia ngā whakatūpato ki te ārai i te horanga o te KOWHEORI-19, pēnei i te tū tīrara, te mau ārai kanohi rānei. Mēnā he mōreareatanga ki tō oranga, kāinga rānei, me waea ki 111 ka tono i te Pirihimana, Whakaratonga Iwi, Waka Tūroro rānei. Ehara tēnei i te wā hou ki te kuhu ki ētahi mahi hou, te whakaraerae rānei i a koe, tō kāhui rāhui rānei ki te mōrearea. Ka taea ngā mahi rēhia mōrearea iti i tō rohe paetata. I te Pae Mataara 3, me mahi te katoa mai i te kāinga mēnā ka taea. Mēnā he pānga tata ā-tinana kei roto i ngā mahi a tō pakihi, e kore e whakaaehia kia tuwhera.Ka taea e ērā atu pakihi te mahi, engari tērā ngā here. Arā: ngā here tū tīrara kia nui ake ngā tikanga akuaku te horoi me te paturopi auau i ngā mata tiri te whiwhi i ngā kōwhiringa pānga kore mō te tono, te tiki, te kawe me te utu. te whakarite i te maunga a ngā kaimahi, ngā kiritaki me ngā manuhiri i ngā ārai kanohi mēnā e tika ana. He iti noa ngā pakihi e āhei atu ai ngā kiritaki te toro atu ki ō rātou wāhi mahi, rapua ko ēhea aua pakihi . Me tutuki hoki i ngā pakihi te katoa o ngā here hauora me te haumaru, te tiaki i ngā kaimahi, ā, me te whakatutuki i ngā paerewa tuku mahi mōkito rawa. E ākina ana ngā pakihi ki te kōrero ki ngā kaimahi ki te tautuhi i ngā mōreareatanga me ngā huarahi whakahaere i aua mōreareatanga E ai ki te ture, me whai tukanga ngā pakihi me ngā kaiwhakarite taiopenga e taea ai te rekoata i tō toronga. Me whai huarahi nui atu i te kotahi mō te pūrongo i te toronga o te tangata, inarā mō te hunga kāore e taea e rātou te matawai i ngā waehere QR. Ka uru ki tēnei ngā whare kawhe, ngā whare kai, ngā wāhi inu waipiro, ngā whare petipeti, ngā kōnehete, ngā whare kaumātua, ngā whare hauora (hāunga ngā tūroro), ngā kaikuti makawe, ngā whare kori, whare kanikani, whare pukapuka, kōti, tari kaunihera, kāwanatanga hoki, me ngā kaituku ratonga pāpori e whai wāhi taupaepae ana. Koinei ētahi momo rekoata i tō toronga: te pātai i te tangata kia matawai mā te taupānga NZ COVID Tracer te rekoata ā-ringa i ngā taipitopito a ō kiritaki, manuhiri hoki. te whakarato puka tuhi hei whakakī mā ngā kiritaki me ngā manuhiri ki ō rātou taipitopito, ā, ka rau ki tētahi pouaka kohi mā te whakamahi ō pūnaha puri rekoata, pēnei i te āheinga kāri miri, te whakarite tāpui rānei. Me haere tonu te mahi a ngā pakihi ki te whakaatu i te tohu waehere QR, ahakoa kāore e hiahiatia ana ki te kohi i ngā rekoata kiritaki. He mōhiohio whaiaro ngā rekaota whakapā. Me haumaru te kohi, te whakamahi, te puri, te whāki, ā, me te porowhiu i runga anō i ngā tikanga o te Privacy Act 2020. He nui ake pea ngā hiahia haumaru o ngā pūnaha rekoata rerekē. Pāwhiri ki konei mō ngā mōhiohio e pā ana ki te puri rekoata me te whaiwhai i te pātanga mā ngā pakihi Ka mahi tonu ngā ratonga ohotata i ngā Pae Mataara katoa Ina pā he ohotata, whāia ngā aratohu ohotata whānui, tohutohu rānei mai i ngā mana ohotata. Ko tō haumarutanga te mea nui. Kia haumaru koe, whāia ngā whakatūpato ki te ārai i te horanga o te KOWHEORI-19, pēnei i te tū tīrara, te mau ārai kanohi rānei. Mēnā he mōreareatanga ki tō oranga, kāinga rānei, me waea ki 111 ka tono i te Pirihimana, Whakaratonga Iwi, Waka Tūroro rānei. Rapu me aha koe i te wā o te ohotata --- Section Separator --- Information for Māori Support and information for Pacific Peoples Support and information for disabled people Support your community Alternate formats Translations አማርኛ | Amharic عربي | Arabic Bislama 简体中文 | Chinese (Simplified) 繁體中文 | Chinese (Traditional) Te Reo Māori Kuki ‘Āirani | Cook Islands Māori Español | Spanish دری | Dari فارسی | Farsi Vosa Vakaviti | Fijian ગુજરાતી | Gujarati हिन्दी / Hindi 日本語 | Japanese ကညီ | Karen Te taetae ni Kiribati | Kiribati 한국어 | Korean Bahasa Malaysia | Malay Vagahau Niue | Niuean پښتو | Pashto ਪੰਜਾਬੀ / Punjabi Rohingya Fäeag Rotuḁm | Rotuman Gagana Samoa | Samoan Solomon Aelan Pijin | Solomon Islands Pijin Af-Soomaali | Somali Kiswahili | Swahili Tagalog தமிழ் | Tamil Te reo Māori ภาษาไทย | Thai ትግርኛ | Tigrinya Tok Pisin Te Gagana Tokelau | Tokelauan Lea Faka Tonga | Tongan Te Gana Tuvalu | Tuvaluan اُردُو | Urdu Tiếng Việt | Vietnamese አማርኛ | Amharic عربي | Arabic Bislama 简体中文 | Chinese (Simplified) 繁體中文 | Chinese (Traditional) Te Reo Māori Kuki ‘Āirani | Cook Islands Māori Español | Spanish دری | Dari فارسی | Farsi Vosa Vakaviti | Fijian ગુજરાતી | Gujarati हिन्दी / Hindi 日本語 | Japanese ကညီ | Karen Te taetae ni Kiribati | Kiribati 한국어 | Korean Bahasa Malaysia | Malay Vagahau Niue | Niuean پښتو | Pashto ਪੰਜਾਬੀ / Punjabi Rohingya Fäeag Rotuḁm | Rotuman Gagana Samoa | Samoan Solomon Aelan Pijin | Solomon Islands Pijin Af-Soomaali | Somali Kiswahili | Swahili Tagalog தமிழ் | Tamil Te reo Māori ภาษาไทย | Thai ትግርኛ | Tigrinya Tok Pisin Te Gagana Tokelau | Tokelauan Lea Faka Tonga | Tongan Te Gana Tuvalu | Tuvaluan اُردُو | Urdu Tiếng Việt | Vietnamese
Home Iwi and communities Translations Te reo Māori Ngā Pāe Mataara | The Alert Levels Te noho i te pae 4 | Living at Level 4 --- Section Separator --- Mehemea kua pāngia koe e ngā tohumate o te maremare, te rewharewha, te KOWHEORI-19 rānei, e noho ki te kāinga, ka waea-utukore ai ki Healthline mā te 0800 358 5453 , ki tō tākuta rānei ki te tuku pātai e pā ana ki te whakamātautau. Kia mahara ake, kāore he utu o te whakamātautau. Mēnā he ohotata tōu, kia wawe tonu te waea atu ki 111 . Mō te Pae Mataara 4 me: noho koe ki te kāinga, atu i te koringa mōu ake me whai tapu tō miru. He mea nui te tiaki i ngā tāngata i tō miru 2 mita te tawhiti i ngā tāngata o miru kē atu i a koe e wehe atu ana i te kāinga ki te koringa mōu ake haere ki te papa tata ki a koe ki te kori haere ki te hokomaha tata ki a koe mahi, ako hoki mai i te kāinga. Ko ētahi kaimahi anake e āhei ana ki te haere ki te mahi, engari he taumaha ngā here i runga i tēnei. mau ārai kanohi i ngā waka kawe pāhihi tūmatanui, i ngā wāhi wehenga, i ngā rerenga, i roto tēkehi, waka tiri rānei, i ngā whare hauora me ngā pakihi e tuwhera tonu ana. E whakahaua ana kia mau hoki tētahi ina uaua kē te tū tīrara. auau te horoi, te whakamaroke hoki i ō ringaringa. He mea nui kia auau te whai i ngā tikanga akuaku noa, tae atu ki te horoi ringaringa, te mare, te tihe rānei ki tō tuke, te whakapai hoki i ngā papa. whai i ngā wāhi i tae atu ai koe mā te taupānga Whaiwhai KOWHEORI o Aotearoa, mā te puka Whaiwhai KOWHEORI-19, mā te tuhituhi noa rānei. He āwhinatanga tēnei e wawe ai te whaiwhai pānga mēnā e hiahiatia ana. Pāwhiri ki konei mō ngā kōrero mō te huaketo me ngā tohu o te KOWHEORI-19 Pāwhiri ki konei mō ngā kōrero mō te whakamātautau Pāwhiri ki konei mō ngā kōrero mō te whaiwhai Hono Iarere Ka taea tonu e koe te whiwhi kano ārai mate i te Pae Mataara 4 mēnā he tāpuitanga tōu. E tuwhera tonu ana ngā whare kano ārai mate. Ka mahi tonu rātou i raro i ngā herenga o te Pae Mataara 4. E akiaki ana mātou i a koe kia whiwhi i te kano ārai mate kua oti kē te whakamahere. I te Pae Mataara 4, kua whakaturehia te mau maruhā: i runga waka tūmatanui me ngā wāhi wehenga, hei tauira, tūranga tereina pahi hoki i te wā e toro atu ana ki ngā whare hauora i ngā pakihi e tuwhera tonu ana, he pānga ā-kiritaki, pēnei i ngā hokomaha, kēmehi, me ngā toa penehīni. E akiakitia ana te mau maruhā i ngā wā e wehe atu ai koe i te kāinga. Pāwhiri ki konei mō ngā kōrero mō ngā maruhā me ngā ārai kanohi He whāiti ngā haerenga e āheitia ana i te Pae Mataara 4 i tua atu i ngā take e whakaaetia ana i raro nei. Mēnā e haere ana koe mō tētahi take e whakaaetia ana, kāore e hiahiatia ana tētahi atu momo whakaaetanga ki te hāereere. Engari me mau haere tonu koe i tētahi taunakitanga o tō take hāereere. Mēnā he tohumate KOWHEORI-19 āu, i tata koe ki tētahi i whakamātauria e pāngia ana e te KOWHEORI-19, ko koe rānei i whakamātauria e pāngia ana ki te KOWHEORI-19, kaua e hāereere - ahakoa e whakaaetia ana - ā, me noho taratahi, ka waea atu ki te Healthline mō ētahi tohutohu, ā, kia whakamātauria. Mēnā e raru ana koe i te whai moni, i te kai, kua raru ā-hinengaro, ā-tinana rānei, tērā he āwhinatanga hei whai māu. Pāwhiri ki konei mō ngā kōrero āwhina i te tangata takitahi Pāwhiri ki konei mō ngā kōrero āwhina i ngā pakihi --- Section Separator --- Mehemea kua pāngia koe e ngā tohumate o te maremare, te rewharewha, te KOWHEORI-19 rānei, e noho ki te kāinga, ka waea-utukore ai ki Healthline mā te 0800 358 5453 , ki tō tākuta rānei ki te tuku pātai e pā ana ki te whakamātautau. Home Iwi and communities Translations Te reo Māori Te Rongoā Ārai Mate Korona | The COVID-19 vaccine Me pēhea te whiwhi kano ārai mate | How to get a vaccine Ā muri i te whakatōnga o te kano ārai mate | After your immunisation --- Section Separator --- Ko te kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19 he kore utu, he mahi tūao, ā, e wātea ana ki ngā tāngata katoa o Aotearoa kei tua i te 12 tau te pakeke. Haere ki Book My Vaccine waea atu rānei ki te COVID Vaccination Healthline ki te whakarite tāpui. 0800 28 29 26 Book My Vaccine (external link) Pēnei i ngā rongoā katoa, tērā pea he mate āpiti ka pā atu ki ētahi tāngata. Koinei tā te tinana urupare māori atu, ā, he tohu tēnei kei te whaihua te kano ārai mate. I te nuinga o te wā, he māmā noa iho te pānga, ka mutu kāore e roa taua pānga, ā, ehara i te mea mā ērā e aukati tō whai i te tuarua o ngā kano ārai mate, e whakararu rānei ō mahi o ia rā. Ka nui ake pea ngā uruparenga i muri i te kainga tuarua o te rongoā ārai mate. Ka pāngia pea e ngā uruparenga kino rawa, engari, ruarua noa iho ngā wā e pēnei ana. Kua whakangungua ngā kaituku rongoā ārai mate ki te whakatikatika, te āwhina hoki ina pāngia te tangata e ēnei āhuatanga. Nā ngā uruparenga ka pāngia pea mō te wā poto tō āhei ki te taraiwa, te whakamahi rānei i ngā pūrere. Ki te puta tēnei āhuatanga, tēnā, kōrero ki tō kaitukumahi. Ki te pāngia koe e ngā tohumate e whai pānga ana ki te KOWHEORI-19, pērā ki te maremare mutunga kore, he kirikā, he rerekē, ka ngaro rānei tō rongo ā-waha, ā-ihu rānei, me noho koe ki te kāinga ka whakamātauria ki te whakamātau KOWHEORI-19. Ki te raru pokanoa koe ki te wero KOWHEORI-19, me tuku pūrongo tō kaiwero ārai mate, mātanga hauora rānei ki te Centre for Adverse Reactions Monitoring (CARM). E taea ai hoki te whakapūrongo i ngā uruparenga pokanoa ki tō rātou puka pūrongo ā-ipurangi kei runga i te paetukutuku o CARM otago.ac.nz/carm (external link) . Mehemea kāore koe i te tino mōhio he aha te tikanga o ngā tohumate, ki te kaha ake rānei, me kōrero ki tō Tākuta, waea atu rānei ki Healthline i 0800 358 5453 . Mehemea kei te āwangawanga koe ki tō haumarutanga, waea atu ki 111 me te maumahara ki te kī atu kua whiwhi koe i tō wero ārai mate KOWHEORI-19, kia pai ai tā rātou aromatawai i a koe. He mea tiaki hoki te rongoā ārai mate i te tangata katoa ahakoa te pakeke ki ngā mate mau noa hoki, pērā ki te karawaka me te rewharewha. Tirohia kua whiwhi katoa koutou ko tō whānau i ngā wero ārai mate mā te kōrero ki tō kaiwhakarato hauora. Me haere ki health.govt.nz/immunisation (external link) mō ētahi atu kōrero. Me tatari mō te rua wiki rawa i muri i tō kainga tuarua o te wero KOWHEORI-19 i mua i ētahi atu wero ārai mate. --- Section Separator --- Ko te kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19 he kore utu, he mahi tūao, ā, e wātea ana ki ngā tāngata katoa o Aotearoa kei tua i te 12 tau te pakeke. Haere ki Book My Vaccine waea atu rānei ki te COVID Vaccination Healthline ki te whakarite tāpui. 0800 28 29 26 Book My Vaccine (external link) --- Section Separator --- Pēnei i ngā rongoā katoa, tērā pea he mate āpiti ka pā atu ki ētahi tāngata. Mehemea kāore koe i te tino mōhio he aha te tikanga o ngā tohumate, ki te kaha ake rānei, me kōrero ki tō Tākuta, waea atu rānei ki Healthline i 0800 358 5453 . Mehemea kei te āwangawanga koe ki tō haumarutanga, waea atu ki 111 me te maumahara ki te kī atu kua whiwhi koe i tō wero ārai mate KOWHEORI-19, kia pai ai tā rātou aromatawai i a koe. He mea tiaki hoki te rongoā ārai mate i te tangata katoa ahakoa te pakeke ki ngā mate mau noa hoki, pērā ki te karawaka me te rewharewha. Tirohia kua whiwhi katoa koutou ko tō whānau i ngā wero ārai mate mā te kōrero ki tō kaiwhakarato hauora. Me haere ki health.govt.nz/immunisation (external link) mō ētahi atu kōrero. Me tatari mō te rua wiki rawa i muri i tō kainga tuarua o te wero KOWHEORI-19 i mua i ētahi atu wero ārai mate. --- Section Separator --- Information for Māori Support and information for Pacific Peoples Support and information for disabled people Support your community Alternate formats Translations አማርኛ | Amharic عربي | Arabic Bislama 简体中文 | Chinese (Simplified) 繁體中文 | Chinese (Traditional) Te Reo Māori Kuki ‘Āirani | Cook Islands Māori Español | Spanish دری | Dari فارسی | Farsi Vosa Vakaviti | Fijian ગુજરાતી | Gujarati हिन्दी / Hindi 日本語 | Japanese ကညီ | Karen Te taetae ni Kiribati | Kiribati 한국어 | Korean Bahasa Malaysia | Malay Vagahau Niue | Niuean پښتو | Pashto ਪੰਜਾਬੀ / Punjabi Rohingya Fäeag Rotuḁm | Rotuman Gagana Samoa | Samoan Solomon Aelan Pijin | Solomon Islands Pijin Af-Soomaali | Somali Kiswahili | Swahili Tagalog தமிழ் | Tamil Te reo Māori ภาษาไทย | Thai ትግርኛ | Tigrinya Tok Pisin Te Gagana Tokelau | Tokelauan Lea Faka Tonga | Tongan Te Gana Tuvalu | Tuvaluan اُردُو | Urdu Tiếng Việt | Vietnamese አማርኛ | Amharic عربي | Arabic Bislama 简体中文 | Chinese (Simplified) 繁體中文 | Chinese (Traditional) Te Reo Māori Kuki ‘Āirani | Cook Islands Māori Español | Spanish دری | Dari فارسی | Farsi Vosa Vakaviti | Fijian ગુજરાતી | Gujarati हिन्दी / Hindi 日本語 | Japanese ကညီ | Karen Te taetae ni Kiribati | Kiribati 한국어 | Korean Bahasa Malaysia | Malay Vagahau Niue | Niuean پښتو | Pashto ਪੰਜਾਬੀ / Punjabi Rohingya Fäeag Rotuḁm | Rotuman Gagana Samoa | Samoan Solomon Aelan Pijin | Solomon Islands Pijin Af-Soomaali | Somali Kiswahili | Swahili Tagalog தமிழ் | Tamil Te reo Māori ภาษาไทย | Thai ትግርኛ | Tigrinya Tok Pisin Te Gagana Tokelau | Tokelauan Lea Faka Tonga | Tongan Te Gana Tuvalu | Tuvaluan اُردُو | Urdu Tiếng Việt | Vietnamese
Home Iwi and communities Translations Te reo Māori Te Rongoā Ārai Mate Korona | The COVID-19 vaccine Me pēhea te whiwhi kano ārai mate | How to get a vaccine Te tono mō te werohanga wawe KOWHEORI-19 | Applying for an early vaccination --- Section Separator --- Ko te kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19 he kore utu, he mahi tūao, ā, e wātea ana ki ngā tāngata katoa o Aotearoa kei tua i te 12 tau te pakeke. Haere ki Book My Vaccine waea atu rānei ki te COVID Vaccination Healthline ki te whakarite tāpui. 0800 28 29 26 Book My Vaccine (external link) Rapu me aha koe ina hiahia tono koe mō tētahi werohanga wawe kia pai ai te haere ki tāwāhi i runga i ngā take ngākau aroha, mō tētahi take nui ki te motu rānei. Kāore e taea e koe te tono mō te werohanga wawe mō ētahi atu take. Rapu āhea taea ai e koe te whiwhi i te kano ārai mate Ka taea e koe te tono mō te werohanga wawe i runga i ngā take ngākau aroha mēnā ka hiahia koe ki te haere ki tāwāhi ki: te whakauru atu ki te tiakanga hauora nui kāore e wātea ana i Aotearoa, mōu, mō tētahi uri rānei (hei tauira, tō tamaiti) te toro atu ki tētahi mema o te whānau kua tata mate te whakarato i te tiakanga nui me te āraitanga mō tētahi uri. Mēnā e haere ana koe ki tāwāhi i mua i te 31 o Hereturikōkā, ka taea e koe te tono tuihono mō tētahi kano ārai mate wawe mā te paetukutuku Manatū Hauora. Ākene pea ka māraurau koe mō tētahi kano ārai mate wawe mēnā e hiahia ana koe ki te haere ki tāwāhi ki: te ārai i te haumarutanga o te motika o Aotearoa ki te tū hei kāwanatanga mōna anō te uru atu ki ngā mahi atawhai tangata kua whakaaetia e te Kāwanatanga hei wāhanga o ngā pūmautanga o Aotearoa ki te tuku āwhinatanga take tāwāhi, ngā urupare aitūa ā-ao, te tautoko rānei i ngā iwi o Te Moana-nui-a-Kiwa ki te whakaora mai i te urutā KOWHEORI-19 te uru atu ki ngā taiopenga nui o te ao, e matea ai te hāereere hei kanoni mō Aotearoa te uru atu ki ngā whiriwhiri kōrero tauhokohoko nui ā-motu. Me tono rawa te tari hāngai, rōpū rānei mōu. Nga tono mō te kano ārai mate wawe (external link) --- Section Separator --- Ko te kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19 he kore utu, he mahi tūao, ā, e wātea ana ki ngā tāngata katoa o Aotearoa kei tua i te 12 tau te pakeke. Home Iwi and communities Translations Te reo Māori Te Rongoā Ārai Mate Korona | The COVID-19 vaccine Me pēhea te whiwhi kano ārai mate | How to get a vaccine Te tāpui i tō kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19 | Booking your COVID-19 vaccination --- Section Separator --- Ko te kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19 he kore utu, he mahi tūao, ā, e wātea ana ki ngā tāngata katoa o Aotearoa kei tua i te 12 tau te pakeke. Haere ki Book My Vaccine waea atu rānei ki te COVID Vaccination Healthline ki te whakarite tāpui. 0800 28 29 26 Book My Vaccine (external link) Ko te huarahi tere rawa o te whakarite i ō toronga kano ārai mate, ko te tāpui ā-tuihono mā Book My Vaccine (external link) . Mēnā kāore anō koe kia māraurau ki te tāpui, ka taea e koe te rēhita kia pai ai tā mātou whakamōhio atu i a koe i te wā tika mōu ki te tāpui. Ka āhua 5 mineti pea te roa o te tāpui ā-tuihono. Mēnā ka pā ētahi raruraru tāpui, e hiahia ana rānei koe ki te panoni i ō taipitopito, ka taea e koe te īmēra mai ki te rōpū o Book My Vaccine. Īmēra: booking@vaccine.covid19.health.nz Book My Vaccine (external link) Ka taea e koe te tāpui mā te waea atu ki te COVID Vaccination Healthline i 0800 28 29 26 . He kore utu ngā waea katoa, ā, e wātea ana te rōpū mai i te 8am ki te 8pm, e whitu rā i te wiki. Ka taea e koe te tono kaiwhakamāori ki te hiahiatia tētahi. Me tatari pea koe i mua i te whakaututanga o tō waea, i te mea ka pokea ngā waea — kia manawanui mai. Kia whakautua tō waea, ka āhua 15 mineti ka pau ki te tāpui i ō toronga. Kia waea mai koe, he pai tonu mēnā e rite ana tō tau NHI (Taupū Hauora ā-Motu). Mā tēnei e tere ake ai te tukanga tāpui. Ka kitea tō tau NHI i runga i tētahi whakahau rongoā, tētahi hua whakamātau, whakaahua hihi-x, tētahi reta rānei mai i te hōhipera. Whakahaeretia ō toronga mā Book My Vaccine (external link) Waea atu ki te COVID Vaccination Healthline i 0800 28 29 26 Mēnā e māuiui ana koe i te rā o tō toronga, me whakarite toronga anō. Ka taea te whiwhi kano ārai mate kia ora mai koe. Mēnā he tohumate āu o te KOWHEORI-19, haere kia whakamātautauria, ā, noho ki te kāinga kia whiwhi rā anō i ō hua. Ka taea te whiwhi kano ārai mate kia puta rā anō te whakamātautau e kī ana kāore koe i te pāngia ki te mate. I tua atu i te tāpui toronga, tērā ētahi atu huarahi e whiwhi ai te tangata i ngā kano ārai mate. Ka uru ki ēnei ko ngā whiwhinga kano ārai mate i te wāhi mahi me ētahi atu kaupapa kano ārai mate motuhake puta noa i te motu. Mō ētahi hapori tuawhenua mamao, ka tuku mātou i ngā kano ārai mate ki ngā reanga katoa i te wā kotahi kia māmā ake ai mō rātou. He nui hoki ngā tākuta e whakarato ana i ngā kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19, ā, whakarite tōtika ana i ngā tāpuitanga. Kia mōhio ai mēnā e tuku ana tō tākuta i tēnei ratonga, haere ki Healthpoint. Kano ārai mate COVID-19 — Healthpoint (external link) Ka taea pea e koe te tono mō te werohanga kano ārai mate wawe mēnā e hiahia ana koe ki te haere ki tāwāhi mō tētahi take ngākau aroha, mō tētahi take nui ki te motu rānei. Te tono mō te whiwhinga kano ārai mate wawe mō ngā haerenga ki tāwāhi — Te Manatū Hauora (external link) Kua whakaturehia ināianei me whiwhi ngā kaimahi i ngā ripa whenua me ngā whare whakamohoao, whakataratahi hoki (MIQ) i te kano hei ārai i te mate KOWHEORI-19. Mā mātou e whakaū ō taipitopito whakapā mā ā mātou pūkete me tō kaitukumahi, ka whakapā atu ki a koe mō te tāpuitanga i ō toronga whiwhi kano ārai mate. Me mau hoki ō taipitopito ki te Rēhita Whakamātautau Hungamahi Ripa Whenua (BWTR). Tēnā pātai ki tō kaitukumahi ki te hihira mēnā e tika ana te whakaurunga o tō ingoa me ō taipitopito (tae atu ki tō rā whānau, nama waea me te tau NHI) ki te BWTR. Mēnā he kaimahi ripa whenua, MIQ rānei koe, ā, kāore anō kia whakapā atu tētahi ki a koe mō te tāpui i tō whiwhinga kano ārai mate, kōrero ki tō kaituku mahi. Rapua he kōrero anō mō ngā whiwhinga kano ārai mate mā ngā kaimahi ripa whenua, MIQ hoki --- Section Separator --- Ko te kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19 he kore utu, he mahi tūao, ā, e wātea ana ki ngā tāngata katoa o Aotearoa kei tua i te 12 tau te pakeke. Haere ki Book My Vaccine waea atu rānei ki te COVID Vaccination Healthline ki te whakarite tāpui. 0800 28 29 26 Book My Vaccine (external link) Ko ngā kano ārai mate tētahi huarahi e ārai ai tātou i te mate urutā o KOWHEORI-19, hei tiaki hoki i te oranga o ō tātou hapori. Kāore he utu o te kano ārai i a KOWHEORI-19, ā, e wātea ana ki ngā tāngata katoa o Aotearoa. Ka tiaki ngā kano ārai mate i tō hauora, ā, ka ārai atu i te mate mā te mahi tahi me ngā wāhanga papare o tō tinana e kaha ai koe ki te ārai atu i te wheori, mehemea ka noho mōrearea koe. Ka whaihua te kano ārai i a KOWHEORI-19 mā te whakaoho i tō pūnaha awhikiri e hua mai ai ngā paturopi, ngā pūtau toto hoki e whai nei ki te ārai i te wheori o KOWHEORI-19. Ko te whai i te kano ārai i a KOWHEORI-19 tētahi mahi hei whāinga māu e ārai ai koe i a koe anō i ngā pānga o te wheori. Heoi anō, kāore mātou i te mōhio mēnā ka riro mā tēnei e mutu ai tō pāngia rānei e te wheori, tō whakapā atu rānei i te wheori ki tangata kē. Kia uru ki a koe te kano ārai mate, me tūpato tonu hei aukati wawe i te horapa haeretanga o KOWHEORI-19. Me āta horoi, me āta whakamaroke hoki ō ringaringa. Me maremare, me matihe hoki ki tō tuke, ā, me noho ki te kāinga mehemea ka māuiui koe. Mā tēnei koe e āwhina ki te tiaki i a koe anō, i tō whānau, i ētahi atu hoki. Me whakamahi tonu i te taupānga whakatewhatewha mō KOWHEORI, whakakāngia te wāhanga o te Hono Iarere o tō waea, ā, tērā pea ka hiahia koe ki te mau i tō tākai mata, i tō ārai mata rānei. Whakaae noa ai a Medsafe kia whakamahia te kano ārai mate i Aotearoa i te wā e whakaae ana rātou kua eke ki te taumata o te haumaru, o te whaihua hoki e tika ana kia whakamahia. Kotahi tonu te whakamātautau haumaru me whai e ngā kano ārai mate katoa e pā ana ki a KOWHEORI- 19, ka mutu me eke te katoa ki ōna paerewa ruarangi e ōrite ana. Kāore koe e pāngia e KOWHEORI-19 mā tēnei kano ārai mate. Me rua rawa ngā whāngaitanga, kia āhua toru wiki te roa i waenga i ngā mea e rua. E eke ai te tiakanga ōu ki te taumata, me whai koe kia rua rawa ngā whāngaitanga ōu ki te kano ārai mate. Mēnā kāore koe e tae atu i te wā kua whakaritea, me wawe tonu tō whakarite i tētahi atu wā. Mēnā kua pāngia koe e te pāwera kino rawa atu, mēnā rānei i tere tonu te pāngia ōu e te pāwera nā te kano ārai mate, nā te werohanga rānei i mua, tēnā kōrerotia tēnei ki te kaiwhāngai i a koe ki te kano ārai mate. Mēnā e whāngaia ana koe ki te rongoā whakawaiwai toto, mēnā rānei e pāngia ana koe e te mate ā-toto, whakamōhiotia te kaiwhāngai i a koe ki te kano ārai mate. Mēnā e hapū ana koe, e whāngai pēpē ana rānei koe ki te ū, tēnā kōrero atu ki te kaiwhāngai i a koe ki te kano ārai mate, ki tō tākuta rānei, ki tō tapuhi whakawhānau rānei. Mēnā e whāngaia ana koe ki ngā rongoā mō te mate pukupuku, arā, ki a Keytruda rānei, ki a Opdivo rānei, ki a Yervoy rānei, ki a Tecentriq rānei, kōrero ki tō mātanga e mōhio ai koe mēnā me whāngai koe ki te kano ārai mate. I tēnei wā, kāore mātou i te whakawātea i te kano ārai mate a Pfizer ki te hunga e tamariki ake ana i te 12 tau te pakeke kia wātea mai he raraunga atu anō. Mēnā e rongo ana koe i ngā tohumate o KOWHEORI-19, whāia kia whakamātauhia koe, ā, e noho ki te kāinga tae noa ki te wā ka whiwhi koe i ngā hua mōu. E whakaaetia ana kia whāngaia koe ki te kano ārai mate ā te wā tonu e kī ana ngā hua o tō whakamātautau kāore koe e pāngia ana . Me tatari kia pau te 20 meneti i muri i te whāngaia ōu ki te kano ārai mate kia kite ai ngā kaimahi hauora kāore e pērā rawa ana te kino o te pāngia ōu e te pāwera. Ko te kōrero nui katoa ka puta mō ngā tauhohenga, ko te mamae o te wāhi i werohia ai, ko te ānini o te māhunga, ko te rongo rānei i te ngenge, i te ruha rānei. Tērā pea ka rangona hoki te mamae o ngā uaua, te māuiui noa iho nei, te hūwiniwini, te kirikā, te mamae o ngā ponapona me te whakapai ruaki. He tohu tēnei e whaihua ana te kano ārai mate. Pēnei i ngā rongoā katoa, tērā pea he mate āpiti ka pā atu ki ētahi tāngata. Ko aua mate rā ka kitea nuitia ana, ka māmā noa iho i te nuinga o te wā, ka mutu kāore e roa ana te mate, ā, ehara i te mea mā ērā e aukati tō whai i te tuarua o ngā kano ārai mate, e whakararu rānei ō mahi o ia rā. Ka pā pea ētahi mate āpiti ki tō kaha ki te hautū waka, ki te whakamahi mīhini rānei. He wā ōna ka puta ētahi mate pāwera kino nei, engari me uaua ka kitea. Kua whakangungua ā mātou kaiwhāngai i te tangata ki te kano ārai mate kia whakahaerehia ēnei āhuatanga. Ki te pāngia koe e ngā tohumate e hāngai ana pea ki a KOWHEORI-19, pērā i te maremare hou e auau ana, i te teitei o te pāmahana, i te kirikā rānei, i te korenga rānei, i te panonitanga rānei o ō tairongo māori ā-tako rānei, ā-ihu rānei, e noho ki te kāinga, whakaritea hoki kia whakamātautauria tō tinana mō KOWHEORI-19. Mēnā kāore koe i te mōhio ki te āhua o ō tohumate, ki te kino haere rānei ō tohumate, waeahia te Healthline mā te 0800 358 5453 . Mēnā he māharahara inamata tōu e pā ana ki tō haumarutanga, waeahia te 111 , ka āta kī atu ai ki a rātou kua werohia koe ki te kano ārai i a KOWHEORI-19 kia tika ai tā rātou tirotiro i a koe. www.health.govt.nz/covid-vaccine (external link) --- Section Separator --- Ko te kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19 he kore utu, he mahi tūao, ā, e wātea ana ki ngā tāngata katoa o Aotearoa kei tua i te 12 tau te pakeke. Haere ki Book My Vaccine waea atu rānei ki te COVID Vaccination Healthline ki te whakarite tāpui. 0800 28 29 26 Book My Vaccine (external link) Ko te nuinga o ngā mahi i Aotearoa i te wā nei ka taea e ngā tāngata kāore anō i whiwhi kano ārai mate. Rapu ka aha mēnā ko te mahi e mahi ana koe, me oti i tētahi kaimahi kua whiwhi kano ārai i te mate KOWHEORI-19. Kāore e taea e tō kaitukumahi te tuku mōhiohio mō tō tūnga werohanga kano ārai mate ki tētahi atu, māna kua whakaae koe kia pērā, māna rānei he okotahi kei raro i te Ture Matatapu. Ehara i te mea me whāki koe ki tō kaitukumahi kua werohia koe ki te kano ārai mate. Ina whakatau koe kia kaua e werohia ki te kano ārai mate, ehara i te mea me whāki koe he aha ai. Mēnā kei roto koe i tētahi tūranga mahi me oti i tētahi kaimahi kua werohia e te kano ārai mate, engari kāore tonu koe i te hiahia whāki i tō tūnga werohanga kano, ka taea e tō kaituku mahi te kī he whiwhinga-kore koe i te kano, engari me kōrero ia ki a koe e pērā ana ia. Mēnā e whakaaro ana tō kaituku mahi tērā ētahi mahi hei mahi mā ngā kaimahi whai kano ārai mate anake, i runga anō i ngā take hauora me te haumaru, me whakahaere ia i tētahi aromatawai mōrearea mō te whakaraerae KOWHEORI-19. Ko tēnei aromatawai me oti i te taha o ngā kaimahi, ngā uniana me ētahi atu māngai. Me whai whakaaro te aromatawai morearea: ki te tūponotanga whakaraerae o ngā kaimahi ki te KOWHEORI-19 i te wā e mahi ana i taua mahi ngā tūpono pānga o tērā - hei tauira, te rere ā-hapori. He aratohu āmiki atu tā WorkSafe mō ngā aromatawai mōrearea. Te aromatawai mēnā e tika ana kia mahia taua mahi motuhake e tētahi kaimahi whai kano ārai mate. (external link) Ka hāngai tonu ngā takohanga ture mahi o nāianei. Arā: te whakarerekē i ngā tikanga me ngā here o te mahi mā te whakaaetanga te whakawhitiwhiti whakaaro i runga i te pono te karo i te whakahāweatanga takahi ture o ngā kaimahi i runga i te tūnga werohanga kano ārai mate te kore e whai i ngā mahi ka tūpono whakararu tikakore i ngā kaimahi i runga i te āhua o te tūnga werohanga kano ārai mate. Ahakoa ehara te kano ārai mate i te āhuatanga whakature, ā, kei te tangata tonu te tikanga ki te whiwhi i te kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19, ko ngā mahi katoa e kawea ana i ngā taiao MIQ, rohe whenua mōrearea teitei rānei, me oti i te hunga kua werohia ki te kano ārai i te mate KOWHEORI--19. Ka uru ngā kaimahi kāwanatanga i ngā taunga rererangi ā-ao, ngā wāpu me ngā rererangi. Tērā ētahi okotahi ki tēnei. Hei tauira, ka taea e te tangata kore kano ārai mate te uru atu me te mahi i ngā wā me ngā wāhi hei whakaora, hei tiaki rānei i te oranga o te tangata, te hauora me te haumaru i te wā o te ohotata; mēnā rānei e whakamanahia ana i raro i te ture. Ngā whakaritenga kano ārai mate mā ngā kaimahi i ngā taiao rohe whenua mōrearea teitei Mēnā kaore kōrua ko tō kaituku mahi i te whakaae tahi mō te āhuatanga o ngā mahi hei whakaoti mā te kaimahi kua whai kano ārai mate anake, ka āhei koe ki te toro atu ki te Ratonga Whakatau Wawe. E tāpae ana i tētahi tukanga kore utu, ōpaki hoki e whakamātau ana ki te whakatau i ngā take. Ratonga Whakatau Wawe (external link) Te kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19 me te mahi - Employment NZ (external link) --- Section Separator --- Ko te kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19 he kore utu, he mahi tūao, ā, e wātea ana ki ngā tāngata katoa o Aotearoa kei tua i te 12 tau te pakeke. Mēnā e whakaaro ana tō kaituku mahi tērā ētahi mahi hei mahi mā ngā kaimahi whai kano ārai mate anake, i runga anō i ngā take hauora me te haumaru, me whakahaere ia i tētahi aromatawai mōrearea mō te whakaraerae KOWHEORI-19. Ko tēnei aromatawai me oti i te taha o ngā kaimahi, ngā uniana me ētahi atu māngai. Me whai whakaaro te aromatawai morearea: ki te tūponotanga whakaraerae o ngā kaimahi ki te KOWHEORI-19 i te wā e mahi ana i taua mahi ngā tūpono pānga o tērā - hei tauira, te rere ā-hapori. He aratohu āmiki atu tā WorkSafe mō ngā aromatawai mōrearea. Te aromatawai mēnā e tika ana kia mahia taua mahi motuhake e tētahi kaimahi whai kano ārai mate. (external link) Ka hāngai tonu ngā takohanga ture mahi o nāianei. Arā: te whakarerekē i ngā tikanga me ngā here o te mahi mā te whakaaetanga te whakawhitiwhiti whakaaro i runga i te pono te karo i te whakahāweatanga takahi ture o ngā kaimahi i runga i te tūnga werohanga kano ārai mate te kore e whai i ngā mahi ka tūpono whakararu tikakore i ngā kaimahi i runga i te āhua o te tūnga werohanga kano ārai mate. Ahakoa ehara te kano ārai mate i te āhuatanga whakature, ā, kei te tangata tonu te tikanga ki te whiwhi i te kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19, ko ngā mahi katoa e kawea ana i ngā taiao MIQ, rohe whenua mōrearea teitei rānei, me oti i te hunga kua werohia ki te kano ārai i te mate KOWHEORI--19. Ka uru ngā kaimahi kāwanatanga i ngā taunga rererangi ā-ao, ngā wāpu me ngā rererangi. Tērā ētahi okotahi ki tēnei. Hei tauira, ka taea e te tangata kore kano ārai mate te uru atu me te mahi i ngā wā me ngā wāhi hei whakaora, hei tiaki rānei i te oranga o te tangata, te hauora me te haumaru i te wā o te ohotata; mēnā rānei e whakamanahia ana i raro i te ture. Ngā whakaritenga kano ārai mate mā ngā kaimahi i ngā taiao rohe whenua mōrearea teitei Mēnā kaore kōrua ko tō kaituku mahi i te whakaae tahi mō te āhuatanga o ngā mahi hei whakaoti mā te kaimahi kua whai kano ārai mate anake, ka āhei koe ki te toro atu ki te Ratonga Whakatau Wawe. E tāpae ana i tētahi tukanga kore utu, ōpaki hoki e whakamātau ana ki te whakatau i ngā take. Home Iwi and communities Translations Te reo Māori Te Rongoā Ārai Mate Korona | The COVID-19 vaccine Me pēhea te whiwhi kano ārai mate | How to get a vaccine Ko wai e āhei ana ki tētahi kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19? | Who can get a COVID-19 vaccine --- Section Separator --- Ko te kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19 he kore utu, he mahi tūao, ā, e wātea ana ki ngā tāngata katoa o Aotearoa kei tua i te 12 tau te pakeke. Haere ki Book My Vaccine waea atu rānei ki te COVID Vaccination Healthline ki te whakarite tāpui. 0800 28 29 26 Book My Vaccine (external link) Ko te kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19 he kore utu, he mahi tūao, ā, e wātea ana ki ngā tāngata katoa o Aotearoa kei tua i te 12 tau te pakeke. Kāore he aha o tō tūnga kōkota, kirirarau rānei. E kore e whakamahia ngā mōhiohio i kohia mō ngā take manene, ā, ka tiakina tō matataputanga. Ina whiwhi kano ārai mate koe, e tiaki ana koe i a koe anō, me te whakaiti i te mōrearea tuku i te KOWHEORI-19 ki tō whānau, ō hoa me te hapori. I konei koe ka kite i ngā mōhiohio whaitake o te hunga e āhei ana ki te kano ārai mate, tae atu ki ngā āhuatanga pēnei i tō pakeke, mēnā e hapū ana, e whāngote ana rānei, mēnā he pānga pāwera tāu ki te kano ārai mate i mua, mēnā rānei he tūmomo mate mauroa tāhau. E kore e taea e ngā tāngata i raro i te 12 tau te whiwhi i te kano ārai mate Pfizer i tēnei wā. Ko ngā whakaaturanga mai o te kano ārai mate, he tino whaihua, haumaru hoki mā ngā tāngata pakeke ake i te 65 tau. E pai ana mā te hunga kaimanga. Kāore he hua kararehe i roto. Kāore hoki he paturopi, he hua toto, he DNA, he pūmua, he matū kōpū, he kurutene, he hua poaka, he tāroki, he hoi, kāore rānei he latex (i hangaia mai te taupoki ipuipu i te rapa horihori - bromobutyl). Rapua te rārangi whakauru nui o te kano ārai mate a Pfizer (external link) Mēnā e hapū ana koe, ka taea e koe tētahi kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19 i ngā wāhanga hapūtanga katoa. E whakaatu ana ngā raraunga mai i te maha o ngā tāngata hapū kua whiwhi kē i te kano ārai mate i te ao, kāore he māharahara haumaru tāpiri o te tuku i ngā kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19. Ka whai hua pea te pēpi mai i te tuku kano ārai mate i te hapūtanga, i te mea he taunakitanga e whakaatu ana i te tukunga o te paturopi i te toto taura me te waiū, e tuku ana pea i te āraitanga ki ngā pēpi mā te awhikiri taupoto. Mēnā he pātai āu, māharahara rānei, kōrerotia ki tō mātanga hauora. Mēnā e whakaaro ana koe i tētahi hapūtanga ka taea tonu e koe te kano ārai mate a Pfizer. E kore e pā kinotia ō ira, tō matahua rānei e te kano ārai mate a Pfizer. E kore te mRNA mai i te kano ārai mate e kuhu ki te karihi o ngā ira, te wāhi o tō DNA. Kāore he wāhanga o te kano ārai mate, o te pūmua koikoi rānei ka hua mai, e tae ki te wharekano, ngā raho rānei. Mēnā i pā tētahi pāwera kino, wawe rānei ki tētahi kano ārai mate, werohanga rānei i mua, kōrerotia atu tēnei ki tō tākuta, mātanga hauora, kaituku kano rānei. Kaua e haere ki te tiki kano ārai mēnā he hītori tāu o te whai tauhohe pāwera tino taumaha: ki tētahi whakaurunga o te kano ārai mate Pfizer ki tētahi werohanga o mua o te kano ārai mate Pfizer He aha kei roto i te kano ārai mate Pfizer - Te Manatū Hauora (external link) Mēnā e māuiui ana koe i te rā o tō toronga, e aua atu te mate kirikā i te 38°C, me whakatārewa e koe tō whiwhinga kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19 kia ora mai ai koe. Kāore e taea e koe te kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19 i te wā e whiwhi ana koe i ētahi atu kano ārai mate. Me tatari mō tētahi wā, i runga anō i te āhua o te kano ārai mate. Tatari mō te 2 wiki i waenga i te kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19 me te kano ārai mate rewharewha. E tūtohu ana mātou kia whiwhi koe i ngā werohanga e rua o te kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19 i te tuatahi - e 3 wiki te itinga o te wā wehenga o ēnei werohanga e rua. Ka taea e koe te kano ārai mate rewharewha atu i te 2 wiki i muri i tō werohanga tuarua. Mēnā kāore ō toronga whakarite mō te kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19, tīkina tō kano ārai mate rewharewha i te tuatahi. Ka taea e koe tō werohanga KOWHEORI-19 tuatahi i te 2 wiki i muri mai o tēnei. E tūtohu ana mātou kia whiwhi koe i ngā werohanga e rua o te kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19 i te tuatahi - e 3 wiki te itinga o te wā i waenga i ēnei werohanga e rua. Mēnā ka whiwhi koe i te kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19 i te tuatahi, me tatari koe mō te itinga o te 2 wiki i muri o te werohanga tuarua, i mua o tō whiwhinga i te kano ārai mate MMR. Mēnā ka whiwhi koe i te kano ārai mate MMR i te tuatahi, me tatari koe mō te itinga o te 4 wiki i mua i tō whiwhinga i te werohanga tuatahi o te kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19. Ko te kitenga o ngā whakamātautau haumanu, ka whai hua te kano ārai mate puta noa i ngā taipakekehanga, ngā ira, ngā mātāwaka me ngā iwi ahakoa ngā tumomo mate mauroa. Ka taea e koe te āheinga wawe ki te kano ārai mate mēnā kei tua koe o te 16 tau, ā, ka ea i a koe tētahi, ētahi rānei o ngā paearu nei: He mate hauora tāu, ko te tikanga o tēnei mate e māraurau ana koe mō te kano ārai mate rewharewha ka utua e te kāwanatanga, tae atu ki te hunga e hapū ana. Kua kohuratia koe ki te mate hinengaro taumaha (tae atu ki te mate tuakoi, mate pāpouri nui, mate bipolar, mate huinga tohumate tuakoi maha rānei, me ngā pākeke e whiwhi ana i te hauora hinengaro tuarua, tuatoru rānei me ngā ratonga waranga). He ngoikore te whakahaeretanga o te pēhanga toto nui, he taumaha rānei te pēhanga toto nui. I tēnei āhuatanga, ko te whakamārama o te taumaha, me whiwhi i ngā rongoā whakahaere e rua, neke atu rānei. He tino mōmona koe (kua tautuhia hei BMI ≥40). Mō ētahi atu tohutohu mō te whiwhi kano ārai mate i te wā e pāngia ana e ngā mate taumaha, e whiwhi maimoatanga ana, mātaitanga, kai rongoā rānei, tēnā haere ki te paetukutuku a Te Manatū Hauora. Kupu tohutohu kano ārai mate mā ngā rōpū motuhake me ngā tūmate hauora - Te Manatū Hauora (external link) --- Section Separator --- Ko te kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19 he kore utu, he mahi tūao, ā, e wātea ana ki ngā tāngata katoa o Aotearoa kei tua i te 12 tau te pakeke. Haere ki Book My Vaccine waea atu rānei ki te COVID Vaccination Healthline ki te whakarite tāpui. 0800 28 29 26 Book My Vaccine (external link) Kāore i pēnei rawa te nui o te mahi tahi ā-ao i waenganui i ngā kaipūtaiao me ngā kāwanatanga i te whanaketanga kano ārai mate. Nā tēnei i tere ake ai te whanaketanga o te kano ārai mate, ngā whakamātautau haumanu me ngā whakaaetanga puta noa i te ao. I tere tonu te whanaketanga o ngā kano ārai mate engari kāore i whāia ngā pokatata i ngā tukanga matea, te whakamōrea rānei i te haumarutanga. I taea e ngā kairangahau te whakamahi i ō rātou mōhiotanga o ētahi atu huaketo korona me te whanaketanga kano ārai mate e ahu whakamua ai rātou. I taea hoki e ngā whakamātautau haumanu te kimi wawe i ngā kaitūao huhua nā te aronga nui me te māharahara o te ao whānui ki te KOWHEORI-19. Ko ētahi whakamātautau haumanu ka taea te mahi ngātahi, kaua i te huarahi raupapa. Ko te tikanga o tēnei, ka taea wawe e ngā kaipūtaiao te whakatau mēnā i whaihua te kano ārai mate i te wā poto - otirā i ngā āhuatanga auau, ka hia marama, tau rānei te roa o tēnei mahi. Kua tū ngā whare whakanao nui, e taea ai te hanga wawe i ngā kano ārai mate, ā, me te rahi ake hoki, otirā kāore i taea i mua Ko Medsafe te mana haumaru rongoā o Aotearoa. Ka arotake ia i ngā tono mō ngā rongoā hou katoa, tae atu ki ngā kano ārai mate, kia whakarite kia eke ki ngā paerewa ā-ao me ngā herenga o konei. Ka tuku whakaaetanga anake a Medsafe mō te whakamahi kano ārai mate i Aotearoa, kia tau rā anō ō rātou whakaaro mō te ekenga ki ngā paerewa kaha mō te haumaru, te kaha ārai whakapokenga me te kounga. He tukanga ōrite tēnei i whakamahia ki te aromatawai i ētahi atu rongoā, pērā i te kano ārai mate rewharewha. Kāore he pokatata i whāia i te tukunga o tēnei whakaaetanga. Kua whakamahia angituhia e te hia miriona tāngata huri noa i te ao te kano ārai mate Pfizer. E aroturukuhia tonutia ana mō te haumarutanga Ko te kitenga o ngā whakamātautau haumanu, ka whai hua te kano ārai mate puta noa i ngā taipakekehanga, ngā ira, ngā mātāwaka me ngā iwi ahakoa ngā tumomo mate mauroa. E whakaatu ana ngā rangahau, tata ki te 95% o ngā tāngata kua whiwhi i ngā werohanga e rua o te kano ārai mate, ka āraitia mai i ngā tohumate KOWHEORI-19. Ko te tikanga o tēnā, kia whiwhi koe i ngā werohanga e rua ka tino heke tō tūpono pānga ki te māuiui taumaha. Puta noa i ngā whakamātautau haumanu, i rangahautia te kano ārai mate Pfizer i runga i te 44,000 kaiwhakauru. Ko te huarua o te hunga nei i whiwhi i te kano ārai mate, ko tētahi atu haurua i whiwhi placebo mātaitai. Nō ngā mātāwaka whānui, ngā taipakekehanga, ngā ira me ngā tūmomo mate whānui anō hoki ngā kaiwhakauru. E toru ngā wāhanga whakamātautau i kuhu atu ai te kano ārai mate Pfizer: Ko ngā wāhanga 1 me te 2 i aromatawai i te haumaru me te immunogenicity (te urupare awhikiri i muri o ia werohanga) o ngā taumata werohanga rerekē o te kano ārai mate i tētahi taupori iti. Ko nga wāhanga 2 me te 3 i aromatawai i te haumaru me te kaha ārai o te kano ārai mate ki te KOWHEORI-19 ā-tohumate, i muri i ngā werohanga e rua o te taumata i tohua, e 21 ngā rā i waenga i ngā werohanga, i tētahi taupori nui ake. E māramai ai ki te kaha ārai mau roa me te haumarutanga o te kano ārai mate, e haurapatia ana ngā kaiwhakauru o ēnei whakamātautau haumanu mō te 2 tau atu anō i muri mai i tō rātou werohanga tuarua o te kano ārai mate Pfizer. --- Section Separator --- Ko te kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19 he kore utu, he mahi tūao, ā, e wātea ana ki ngā tāngata katoa o Aotearoa kei tua i te 12 tau te pakeke. Home Iwi and communities Translations Te reo Māori Te Rongoā Ārai Mate Korona | The COVID-19 vaccine Te haumaru me te whanaketanga | Safety and development Pēhea te mahi o te kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19 | How the COVID-19 vaccine works --- Section Separator --- Ko te kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19 he kore utu, he mahi tūao, ā, e wātea ana ki ngā tāngata katoa o Aotearoa kei tua i te 12 tau te pakeke. Haere ki Book My Vaccine waea atu rānei ki te COVID Vaccination Healthline ki te whakarite tāpui. 0800 28 29 26 Book My Vaccine (external link) Ko te kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19 he kore utu, he mahi tūao, ā, e wātea ana ki ngā tāngata katoa o Aotearoa kei tua i te 12 tau te pakeke. Ina whiwhi kano ārai mate koe, e tiaki ana koe i a koe anō, me te whakaiti i te mōrearea tuku i te KOWHEORI-19 ki tō whānau, ō hoa me te hapori. Kia whiwhi koe i ngā werohanga e rua, ka tino heke tō tūpono pānga ki te māuiui taumaha. Ka mahi te kano ārai mate mā te whakaako i tō pūnaha awhikiri ki te aro atu, ki te ārai atu hoki i te huaketo. I konei ka kitea e koe ngā kōrero nui mō te mahi o kano ārai mate. Ko te kano ārai mate Pfizer he kano ārai mate mRNA Kei roto ko te waehere ā-ira mō tētahi wāhanga nui o te huaketo SARS-CoV-2 (KOWHEORI-19) e kīia nei ko te 'pūmua koikoi'. Ko nga pūmua koikoi ngā tara iti i runga i te mata o te wheori. Kia whiwhi koe i te kano ārai mate, ka pānuitia e tō tinana te waehere ā-ira, ā, ka tango kape o te pūmua koikoi. Ka kitea e tō pūnaha awhikiri ēnei pūmua koikoi, ā, ka ako ki te āhukahuka, me te whawhai i te KOWHEORI-19. Ka mōhio ia me pēhea te whakaeke i te huaketo hei ārai i te horapatanga ki tō tinana. Kātahi ka wāwāhitia te waehere ā-ira mai i te kano ārai mate, ka tere, ka māmā hoki te tangohia e tō tinana. Kāore ngā kano ārai mate mRNA e puri i te huaketo e tuku ana i te KOWHEORI-19, tētahi atu huaketo ora, mate, whakaweto rānei. Kāore he painga, he tauwhitiwhiti ranei ki ō DNA, ki ō ira ranei. e kore e uru ngā kano ārai mate mRNA ki te puku o te pūtau, kei reira e mau ana ō tātau DNA. I whanaketia ngā kano ārai mate mRNA mā roto i ngā mahi ngātahitanga ā-ao nui. Kua rangahau, kua mahi hoki ngā kairangahau i ngā kano ārai mate mRNA mō ngā tau maha. Kei roto i tēnei ko ngā rangahau o ngā kano ārai mate rewharewha, Zika, rabies me te cytomegalovirus (CMV). Kua rangahaua hoki e ngā kaipūtaiao ngā pokenga mate korona i mua pēnei i te SARS me te MERS. Nō te tautuhitanga o ngā kaipūtaiao i te mate korona e puta ai te KOWHEORI-19, i tere tā rātou urutau i ngā hangarau mō te KOWHEORI-19. Ahakoa he hangarau āhua hou tēnei, i whāia tonutia ngā tikanga arowhai haumaru me ngā waehere. Kei roto hoki ko ngā whakamātautau haumanu ā-ao hei āwhina ki te whakaatu i te kaha ārai pokenga me te haumarutanga o te kano ārai mate.E whakamahia ana te kano ārai mate Pfizer puta noa i te ao, ā, e haere tonu ana, ngā mahi aroturuki tata mō tōna whaihuatanga me te haumarutanga. --- Section Separator --- Ko te kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19 he kore utu, he mahi tūao, ā, e wātea ana ki ngā tāngata katoa o Aotearoa kei tua i te 12 tau te pakeke. Haere ki Book My Vaccine waea atu rānei ki te COVID Vaccination Healthline ki te whakarite tāpui. 0800 28 29 26 Book My Vaccine (external link) --- Section Separator --- Ko te kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19 he kore utu, he mahi tūao, ā, e wātea ana ki ngā tāngata katoa o Aotearoa kei tua i te 12 tau te pakeke. Ina whiwhi kano ārai mate koe, e tiaki ana koe i a koe anō, me te whakaiti i te mōrearea tuku i te KOWHEORI-19 ki tō whānau, ō hoa me te hapori. I konei ka kitea e koe ngā kōrero nui mō te mahi o kano ārai mate. Ka kitea e tō pūnaha awhikiri ēnei pūmua koikoi, ā, ka ako ki te āhukahuka, me te whawhai i te KOWHEORI-19. Ka mōhio ia me pēhea te whakaeke i te huaketo hei ārai i te horapatanga ki tō tinana. Kei roto i tēnei ko ngā rangahau o ngā kano ārai mate rewharewha, Zika, rabies me te cytomegalovirus (CMV). Kua rangahaua hoki e ngā kaipūtaiao ngā pokenga mate korona i mua pēnei i te SARS me te MERS. Nō te tautuhitanga o ngā kaipūtaiao i te mate korona e puta ai te KOWHEORI-19, i tere tā rātou urutau i ngā hangarau mō te KOWHEORI-19. Ahakoa he hangarau āhua hou tēnei, i whāia tonutia ngā tikanga arowhai haumaru me ngā waehere. Kei roto hoki ko ngā whakamātautau haumanu ā-ao hei āwhina ki te whakaatu i te kaha ārai pokenga me te haumarutanga o te kano ārai mate.E whakamahia ana te kano ārai mate Pfizer puta noa i te ao, ā, e haere tonu ana, ngā mahi aroturuki tata mō tōna whaihuatanga me te haumarutanga. --- Section Separator --- Information for Māori Support and information for Pacific Peoples Support and information for disabled people Support your community Alternate formats Translations አማርኛ | Amharic عربي | Arabic Bislama 简体中文 | Chinese (Simplified) 繁體中文 | Chinese (Traditional) Te Reo Māori Kuki ‘Āirani | Cook Islands Māori Español | Spanish دری | Dari فارسی | Farsi Vosa Vakaviti | Fijian ગુજરાતી | Gujarati हिन्दी / Hindi 日本語 | Japanese ကညီ | Karen Te taetae ni Kiribati | Kiribati 한국어 | Korean Bahasa Malaysia | Malay Vagahau Niue | Niuean پښتو | Pashto ਪੰਜਾਬੀ / Punjabi Rohingya Fäeag Rotuḁm | Rotuman Gagana Samoa | Samoan Solomon Aelan Pijin | Solomon Islands Pijin Af-Soomaali | Somali Kiswahili | Swahili Tagalog தமிழ் | Tamil Te reo Māori ภาษาไทย | Thai ትግርኛ | Tigrinya Tok Pisin Te Gagana Tokelau | Tokelauan Lea Faka Tonga | Tongan Te Gana Tuvalu | Tuvaluan اُردُو | Urdu Tiếng Việt | Vietnamese አማርኛ | Amharic عربي | Arabic Bislama 简体中文 | Chinese (Simplified) 繁體中文 | Chinese (Traditional) Te Reo Māori Kuki ‘Āirani | Cook Islands Māori Español | Spanish دری | Dari فارسی | Farsi Vosa Vakaviti | Fijian ગુજરાતી | Gujarati हिन्दी / Hindi 日本語 | Japanese ကညီ | Karen Te taetae ni Kiribati | Kiribati 한국어 | Korean Bahasa Malaysia | Malay Vagahau Niue | Niuean پښتو | Pashto ਪੰਜਾਬੀ / Punjabi Rohingya Fäeag Rotuḁm | Rotuman Gagana Samoa | Samoan Solomon Aelan Pijin | Solomon Islands Pijin Af-Soomaali | Somali Kiswahili | Swahili Tagalog தமிழ் | Tamil Te reo Māori ภาษาไทย | Thai ትግርኛ | Tigrinya Tok Pisin Te Gagana Tokelau | Tokelauan Lea Faka Tonga | Tongan Te Gana Tuvalu | Tuvaluan اُردُو | Urdu Tiếng Việt | Vietnamese
Home Iwi and communities Translations Te reo Māori Te Rongoā Ārai Mate Korona | The COVID-19 vaccine Te haumaru me te whanaketanga | Safety and development Me pēhea te rapu i ngā mōhiohio pono me te kaupare i ngā tāwaretanga | How to find trustworthy information and avoid scams --- Section Separator --- Ko te kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19 he kore utu, he mahi tūao, ā, e wātea ana ki ngā tāngata katoa o Aotearoa kei tua i te 12 tau te pakeke. Haere ki Book My Vaccine waea atu rānei ki te COVID Vaccination Healthline ki te whakarite tāpui. 0800 28 29 26 Book My Vaccine (external link) He nui ngā mōhiohio kei te ipurangi me ngā pae pāpori mō ngā kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19. Ka toremi pea te tangata, ā, he uaua ki te rapu i ngā kōrero pono. Me whakarite koe i tō whiwhinga mōhiohio mai i ngā puna e whakaponotia ana, ā, kaua e toha i ngā mōhiohio kia mōhio rawa koe he pono. Ka kitea e koe ngā mōhiohio horopū, i takea i runga i ngā mahi pūtaiao hoki, i ēnei wāhi: Ko Te Manatū Hauora te kaiārahi o te pūnaha hauora, hauātanga hoki o Aotearoa, ā, nōna te kawenga whānui mō te whakahaeretanga me te whanaketanga o taua pūnaha. Ngā kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19 - Te Manatū Hauora (external link) He rōpū whakahaere ā-motu a IMAC e noho ana ki te School of Population Health i Te Whare Wānanga o Tāmaki Makaurau. E whakarato ana i ngā mōhiohio motuhake, pono hoki i poua iho ki ngā rangahau pūtaiao o te ao me Aotearoa mō ngā mate ka kauparetia e te kano ārai mate, me ngā hua me ngā mōreareatanga o te tuku awhikiri. The Immunisation Advisory Centre (external link) He umanga te WHO nā Te Rūnanga Whakakotahi i ngā Iwi o te Ao, ā, nōna te kawenga mō te hauora tūmatanui ā-ao. Ngā kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19 - WHO (external link) Tērā ētahi āhuatanga matua me mōhio rawa koe mō te kano ārai mate e pā ana ki ngā tāwaretanga: E kore rawa koe e tonoa kia utu mō te kano ārai mate, te uru rānei ki te whakapūmau i tō tūranga tūtira. Ko ngā mōhiohio ōkawa mō te kano ārai mate ka ahu mai i ētahi kaiwhakarato pono o ngā kōrero hauora, pēnei i Te Manatū Hauora, Unite against Covid-19, tō poari hauora ā-rohe (DHB). E kore tētahi kaimahi hauora e toro atu ki a koe i tō kāinga ki te tuku kano ārai mate, māna, i whakaritea ki a koe i mua. E kore koe e tonoa mō ō mōhiohio whaiaro mā te pātuhi, īmēra rānei. Ina kite koe, ripoatahia ki a CERT NZ, ā, kaua e whakautu ki te karere. Ina whiwhi īmēra, waea, SMS rānei e tono ana i a koe mō ngā taipitopito ā-tahua e pā ana ki te kano ārai mate, he tāwaretanga tērā. Me wawe te ripoata ki a CERT NZ Ina kite koe i ētahi kōrero teka mō te kano ārai mate, ripoatahia ki a CERT NZ (external link) Waihoki, ka taea e koe te waea ki a rātou i te 0800 237 869 . Haere ki Book My Vaccine waea atu rānei ki te COVID Vaccination Healthline ki te whakarite tāpui. 0800 28 29 26 Book My Vaccine (external link) --- Section Separator --- He nui ngā mōhiohio kei te ipurangi me ngā pae pāpori mō ngā kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19. Ka toremi pea te tangata, ā, he uaua ki te rapu i ngā kōrero pono. Me whakarite koe i tō whiwhinga mōhiohio mai i ngā puna e whakaponotia ana, ā, kaua e toha i ngā mōhiohio kia mōhio rawa koe he pono. Ka kitea e koe ngā mōhiohio horopū, i takea i runga i ngā mahi pūtaiao hoki, i ēnei wāhi: Ko Te Manatū Hauora te kaiārahi o te pūnaha hauora, hauātanga hoki o Aotearoa, ā, nōna te kawenga whānui mō te whakahaeretanga me te whanaketanga o taua pūnaha. Ngā kano ārai mate KOWHEORI-19 - Te Manatū Hauora (external link) He rōpū whakahaere ā-motu a IMAC e noho ana ki te School of Population Health i Te Whare Wānanga o Tāmaki Makaurau. E whakarato ana i ngā mōhiohio motuhake, pono hoki i poua iho ki ngā rangahau pūtaiao o te ao me Aotearoa mō ngā mate ka kauparetia e te kano ārai mate, me ngā hua me ngā mōreareatanga o te tuku awhikiri. The Immunisation Advisory Centre (external link) He umanga te WHO nā Te Rūnanga Whakakotahi i ngā Iwi o te Ao, ā, nōna te kawenga mō te hauora tūmatanui ā-ao.
